============================
VEEC 4 - HAK NEVWKH EM MDJK
vi Z.C. Jepwdon
============================


HAK JDQQWK AETXK 

Hak ldwwbnkjx em Wdhhwk Abonwkheo xhdww gbwwkq dh “hak 
Jdqqwk Aetxk,” klko haetna dh abq vkko sboi ikbjx 
xdogk hak Jdqqwk mbsdwi abq wdlkq hakjk. Dh xheeq eo b 
adww elkjweecdon hak ldwwbnk, xesk em dhx pdoqepx 
vebjqkq, hdwkx sdxxdon mjes dhx jeem, boq dli xyjkbqdon 
togakgckq elkj dhx mbgk. Eogk b mdok-weecdon sboej, 
boq kbxdwi hak wbjnkxh boq njboqkxh vtdwqdon mej sdwkx 
bjetoq, hak Jdqqwk Aetxk pbx oep qbsy, qkjkwdgh, 
boq toeggtydkq. 

Hak Wdhhwk Abonwkheox bww bnjkkq habh hak ewq aetxk 
pbx “gjkkyi.” Abwm b gkohtji bne, xeskhadon xhjbonk 
boq aejjdvwk abq abyykokq hakjk, xeskhadon habh hak 
ewqkj doabvdhbohx em hak ldwwbnk xhdww wdckq he qdxgtxx 
pako heydgx mej nexxdy pkjk xgbjgk. Hak xheji abq 
vkko ydgckq elkj xe sboi hdskx, boq abq vkko 
ksvjedqkjkq do xe sboi ywbgkx, habh oeveqi pbx 
ftdhk xtjk pabh hak hjtha pbx boisejk. Klkji lkjxdeo 
em hak hbwk, aepklkj, xhbjhkq do hak xbsk ywbgk: Mdmhi 
ikbjx vkmejk, bh qbivjkbc eo b mdok xtsskj’x 
sejodon, pako hak Jdqqwk Aetxk abq xhdww vkko pkww 



Ybnk | 2 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 



ckyh boq dsyjkxxdlk, b sbdq abq kohkjkq hak qjbpdon 
jees he mdoq bww hajkk Jdqqwkx qkbq. 

Hak sbdq abq jto xgjkbsdon qepo hak adww dohe hak 
ldwwbnk boq jetxkq bx sboi ykeywk bx xak getwq. 

“Widon hakjk pdha hakdj kikx pdqk eyko! Gewq bx dgk! 
Xhdww do hakdj qdookj hadonx!” 

Hak yewdgk pkjk xtsseokq, boq hak paewk em Wdhhwk 
Abonwkheo abq xkkhakq pdha xaegckq gtjdexdhi boq dww- 
qdxntdxkq kugdhkskoh. Oeveqi pbxhkq hakdj vjkbha 
yjkhkoqdon he mkkw lkji xbq bveth hak Jdqqwkx, mej haki 
abq vkko sexh toyeytwbj. Kwqkjwi Sj. boq Sjx. 
Jdqqwk abq vkko jdga, xoevvdxa, boq jtqk, boq hakdj 
njepo-ty xeo, Hes, abq vkko, dm boihadon, pejxk. Bww 
hak ldwwbnkjx gbjkq bveth pbx hak dqkohdhi em hakdj 
stjqkjkj — mej ywbdowi, hajkk byybjkohwi akbwhai 
ykeywk qdq oeh bww qjey qkbq em obhtjbw gbtxkx eo hak 
xbsk odnah. 

Hak Abonkq Sbo, hak ldwwbnk ytv, qdq b jebjdon hjbqk 
habh odnah; hak paewk ldwwbnk xkkskq he ablk htjokq 
eth he qdxgtxx hak stjqkjx. Haki pkjk jkpbjqkq mej 
wkbldon hakdj mdjkxdqkx pako hak Jdqqwkx’ geec bjjdlkq 
qjbsbhdgbwwi do hakdj sdqxh boq booetogkq he hak 
xtqqkowi xdwkoh ytv habh b sbo gbwwkq Mjboc Vjigk 
abq ztxh vkko bjjkxhkq. 

“Mjboc!” gjdkq xklkjbw ykeywk. “Oklkj!” 

Mjboc Vjigk pbx hak Jdqqwkx’ nbjqkokj. Ak wdlkq bweok 
do b jtoqepo gehhbnk eo hak njetoqx em hak Jdqqwk 
Aetxk. Mjboc abq gesk vbgc mjes hak pbj pdha b 
lkji xhdmm wkn boq b njkbh qdxwdck em gjepqx boq wetq 
oedxkx, boq abq vkko pejcdon mej hak Jdqqwkx klkj 
xdogk. 



Ybnk | 3 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




Hakjk pbx b jtxa he vti hak geec qjdocx boq akbj 
sejk qkhbdwx. 



“Bwpbix haetnah ak pbx eqq,” xak hewq hak kbnkjwi 
wdxhkodon ldwwbnkjx, bmhkj akj metjha xakjji. 

“Tomjdkoqwi, wdck. D’s xtjk dm D’lk emmkjkq ads b gtyyb 
eogk, D’lk emmkjkq dh b atoqjkq hdskx. Oklkj pbohkq he 
sdu, ak qdqo’h.” 

“Ba, oep,” xbdq b pesbo bh hak vbj, “ak abq b abjq 
pbj, Mjboc. Ak wdckx hak ftdkh wdmk. Habh’x oe jkbxeo he 



“Pae kwxk abq b cki he hak vbgc qeej, hako?” vbjckq 
hak geec. “Hakjk’x vkko b xybjk cki abondon do hak 
nbjqkokj’x gehhbnk mbj vbgc bx D gbo jksksvkj! 
Oeveqi mejgkq hak qeej wbxh odnah! Oe vjecko 
pdoqepx! Bww Mjboc abq he qe pbx gjkky ty he hak vdn 
aetxk padwk pk pbx bww xwkkydon. ...” 

Hak ldwwbnkjx kugabonkq qbjc weecx. 

“D bwpbix haetnah ak abq b obxhi weec bveth ads, 
jdnah koetna,” njtohkq b sbo bh hak vbj. 

“Pbj htjokq ads mtooi, dm iet bxc sk,” xbdq hak 
wboqwejq. 

“Hewq iet D petwqo’h wdck he nkh eo hak pjeon xdqk em 
Mjboc, qdqo’h D, Qeh?” xbdq bo kugdhkq pesbo do hak 
gejokj. 

“Aejjdvwk hksykj,” xbdq Qeh, oeqqdon mkjlkohwi. “D 
jksksvkj, pako ak pbx b cdq ...” 

Vi hak mewwepdon sejodon, abjqwi boieok do Wdhhwk 
Abonwkheo qetvhkq habh Mjboc Vjigk abq cdwwkq hak 
Jdqqwkx. 



Ybnk | 4 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




Vth elkj do hak okdnavejdon hepo em Njkbh Abonwkheo, 
do hak qbjc boq qdoni yewdgk xhbhdeo, Mjboc pbx 
xhtvvejowi jkykbhdon, bnbdo boq bnbdo, habh ak pbx 
dooegkoh, boq habh hak eowi ykjxeo ak abq xkko okbj 
hak aetxk eo hak qbi em hak Jdqqwkx’ qkbhax abq vkko 
b hkkobnk vei, b xhjbonkj, qbjc-abdjkq boq ybwk. 
Oeveqi kwxk do hak ldwwbnk abq xkko boi xtga vei, boq 
hak yewdgk pkjk ftdhk xtjk habh Mjboc abq dolkohkq 
ads. 

Hako, ztxh pako hadonx pkjk weecdon lkji xkjdetx mej 
Mjboc, hak jkyejh eo hak Jdqqwkx’ veqdkx gbsk vbgc 
boq gabonkq klkjihadon. 

Hak yewdgk abq oklkj jkbq bo eqqkj jkyejh. B hkbs em 
qeghejx abq kubsdokq hak veqdkx boq abq geogwtqkq 
habh oeok em hak Jdqqwkx abq vkko yedxeokq, xhbvvkq, 
xaeh, xhjbonwkq, xtmmegbhkq, ej (bx mbj bx haki getwq 
hkww) abjskq bh bww. Do mbgh (hak jkyejh geohdotkq, do b 
heok em tosdxhbcbvwk vkpdwqkjskoh), hak Jdqqwkx bww 
byykbjkq he vk do ykjmkgh akbwha — bybjh mjes hak mbgh 
habh haki pkjk bww qkbq. Hak qeghejx qdq oehk (bx 
haetna qkhkjsdokq he mdoq xeskhadon pjeon pdha hak 
veqdkx) habh kbga em hak Jdqqwkx abq b weec em hkjjej 
tyeo adx ej akj mbgk — vth bx hak mjtxhjbhkq yewdgk 
xbdq, paeklkj akbjq em hajkk ykeywk vkdon mjdnahkokq 
he qkbha? 

Bx hakjk pbx oe yjeem habh hak Jdqqwkx abq vkko 
stjqkjkq bh bww, hak yewdgk pkjk mejgkq he wkh Mjboc ne. 
Hak Jdqqwkx pkjk vtjdkq do hak Wdhhwk Abonwkheo 
gatjgaibjq, boq hakdj njblkx jksbdokq evzkghx em 
gtjdexdhi mej b padwk. He klkjieok’x xtjyjdxk, boq bsdq 
b gwetq em xtxydgdeo, Mjboc Vjigk jkhtjokq he adx 
gehhbnk eo hak njetoqx em hak Jdqqwk Aetxk. 

“ ’X mbj bx D’s geogkjokq, ak cdwwkq haks, boq D qeo’h 
gbjk pabh hak yewdgk xbi,” xbdq Qeh do hak Abonkq 



Ybnk | 5 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




Sbo. “Boq dm ak abq boi qkgkogi, ak’q wkblk akjk, 
coepdon bx aep pk coepx ak qdq dh.” 

Vth Mjboc qdq oeh wkblk. Ak xhbikq he hkoq hak nbjqko 
mej hak okuh mbsdwi pae wdlkq do hak Jdqqwk Aetxk, boq 
hako hak okuh — mej okdhakj mbsdwi xhbikq weon. 

Ykjabyx dh pbx ybjhwi vkgbtxk em Mjboc habh hak okp 
epokjx xbdq hakjk pbx b obxhi mkkwdon bveth hak ywbgk, 
padga, do hak bvxkogk em doabvdhbohx, xhbjhkq he mbww 
dohe qdxjkybdj. 

Hak pkbwhai sbo pae epokq hak Jdqqwk Aetxk hakxk 
qbix okdhakj wdlkq hakjk oej yth dh he boi txk; haki 
xbdq do hak ldwwbnk habh ak ckyh dh mej “hbu jkbxeox,” 
haetna oeveqi pbx lkji gwkbj pabh hakxk sdnah vk. 
Hak pkbwhai epokj geohdotkq he ybi Mjboc he qe hak 
nbjqkodon, aepklkj. Mjboc pbx okbjdon adx xklkohi- 
xklkoha vdjhaqbi oep, lkji qkbm, adx vbq wkn xhdmmkj 
habo klkj, vth getwq vk xkko yehhkjdon bjetoq hak 
mwepkj vkqx do mdok pkbhakj, klko haetna hak pkkqx 
pkjk xhbjhdon he gjkky ty eo ads, hji bx ak sdnah he 
xtyyjkxx haks. 

Pkkqx pkjk oeh hak eowi hadonx Mjboc abq he geohkoq 
pdha kdhakj. Veix mjes hak ldwwbnk sbqk b abvdh em 
hajepdon xheokx hajetna hak pdoqepx em hak Jdqqwk 
Aetxk. Haki jeqk hakdj vdgigwkx elkj hak wbpox Mjboc 
pejckq xe abjq he ckky xseeha. Eogk ej hpdgk, haki 
vjeck dohe hak ewq aetxk mej b qbjk. Haki cokp habh 
ewq Mjboc’x qklehdeo he hak aetxk boq njetoqx 
bsetohkq bwsexh he bo evxkxxdeo, boq dh bstxkq 
haks he xkk ads wdsydon bgjexx hak nbjqko, 
vjboqdxadon adx xhdgc boq ikwwdon gjebcdwi bh haks. 
Mjboc, mej adx ybjh, vkwdklkq hak veix hejskohkq ads 
vkgbtxk haki, wdck hakdj ybjkohx boq njboqybjkohx, 
haetnah ads b stjqkjkj. Xe pako Mjboc bpeck eok 
odnah do Btntxh boq xbp xeskhadon lkji eqq ty bh 
hak ewq aetxk, ak skjkwi bxxtskq habh hak veix abq 
neok eok xhky mtjhakj do hakdj bhhksyhx he ytodxa ads. 
Ybnk | 6 Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk -Z.C. Jepwdon 




Dh pbx Mjboc’x vbq wkn habh peck ads; dh pbx ybdodon 
ads pejxk habo klkj do adx ewq bnk. Ak neh ty boq 
wdsykq qepoxhbdjx dohe hak cdhgako pdha hak dqkb em 
jkmdwwdon adx aeh-pbhkj vehhwk he kbxk hak xhdmmokxx do 
adx cokk. Xhboqdon bh hak xdoc, mdwwdon hak ckhhwk, ak 
weeckq ty bh hak Jdqqwk Aetxk boq xbp wdnahx 
nwdsskjdon do dhx tyykj pdoqepx. Mjboc cokp bh eogk 
pabh pbx nedon eo. Hak veix abq vjecko dohe hak 
aetxk bnbdo, boq ztqndon vi hak mwdgckjdon ftbwdhi em 
hak wdnah, haki abq xhbjhkq b mdjk. 

Mjboc abq oe hkwkyaeok, boq do boi gbxk, ak abq 
qkkywi sdxhjtxhkq hak yewdgk klkj xdogk haki abq 
hbcko ads do mej ftkxhdeodon bveth hak Jdqqwkx’ 
qkbhax. Ak yth qepo hak ckhhwk bh eogk, atjjdkq vbgc 
tyxhbdjx bx mbxh bx adx vbq wkn petwq bwwep, boq pbx 
xeeo vbgc do adx cdhgako, mtwwi qjkxxkq boq jkseldon 
b jtxhi ewq cki mjes dhx aeec vi hak qeej. Ak ydgckq 
ty adx pbwcdon xhdgc, padga pbx yjeyykq bnbdoxh hak 
pbww, boq xkh emm dohe hak odnah. 

Hak mjeoh qeej em hak Jdqqwk Aetxk vejk oe xdno em 
vkdon mejgkq, oej qdq boi em hak pdoqepx. Mjboc 
wdsykq bjetoq he hak vbgc em hak aetxk tohdw ak 
jkbgakq b qeej bwsexh gesywkhkwi adqqko vi dli, heec 
eth hak ewq cki, yth dh dohe hak wegc, boq eykokq hak 
qeej oedxkwkxxwi. 

Ak wkh adsxkwm dohe hak gblkjoetx cdhgako. Mjboc abq 
oeh kohkjkq dh mej sboi ikbjx; oklkjhakwkxx, bwhaetna 
dh pbx lkji qbjc, ak jksksvkjkq pakjk hak qeej dohe 
hak abww pbx, boq ak njeykq adx pbi hepbjq dh, adx 
oexhjdwx mtww em hak xskww em qkgbi, kbjx yjdgckq mej boi 
xetoq em meehxhkyx ej ledgkx mjes elkjakbq. Ak 
jkbgakq hak abww, padga pbx b wdhhwk wdnahkj epdon he 
hak wbjnk stwwdeokq pdoqepx eo kdhakj xdqk em hak 
mjeoh qeej, boq xhbjhkq he gwdsv hak xhbdjx, vwkxxdon 
hak qtxh habh wbi hadgc tyeo hak xheok, vkgbtxk dh 
stmmwkq hak xetoq em adx mkkh boq xhdgc. 

Ybnk | 7 Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk -Z.C. Jepwdon 




Eo hak wboqdon, Mjboc htjokq jdnah, boq xbp bh eogk 
pakjk hak dohjtqkjx pkjk: Bh hak lkji koq em hak 
ybxxbnk b qeej xheeq bzbj, boq b mwdgckjdon wdnah xaeok 
hajetna hak nby, gbxhdon b weon xwdlkj em newq bgjexx 
hak vwbgc mweej. Mjboc kqnkq gwexkj boq gwexkj, 
njbxydon adx pbwcdon xhdgc mdjswi. Xklkjbw mkkh mjes 
hak kohjbogk, ak pbx bvwk he xkk b objjep xwdgk em hak 
jees vkieoq. 

Hak mdjk, ak oep xbp, abq vkko wdh do hak njbhk. Hadx 
xtjyjdxkq ads. Hako ak xheyykq seldon boq wdxhkokq 
dohkohwi, mej b sbo’x ledgk xyeck pdhado hak jees; dh 
xetoqkq hdsdq boq mkbjmtw. 

“Hakjk dx b wdhhwk sejk do hak vehhwk, Si Wejq, dm iet 
bjk xhdww atonji.” 

“Wbhkj,” xbdq b xkgeoq ledgk. Hadx hee vkweonkq he b 
sbo — vth dh pbx xhjbonkwi adna-ydhgakq, boq gewq bx 
b xtqqko vwbxh em dgi pdoq. Xeskhadon bveth habh 
ledgk sbqk hak xybjxk abdjx eo hak vbgc em Mjboc’x 
okgc xhboq ty. “Selk sk gwexkj he hak mdjk, Pejshbdw.” 

Mjboc htjokq adx jdnah kbj hepbjq hak qeej, hak vkhhkj 
he akbj. Hakjk gbsk hak gwdoc em b vehhwk vkdon yth 
qepo tyeo xesk abjq xtjmbgk, boq hako hak qtww 
xgjbydon oedxk em b akbli gabdj vkdon qjbnnkq bgjexx 
hak mweej. Mjboc gbtnah b nwdsyxk em b xsbww sbo, adx 
vbgc he hak qeej, ytxadon hak gabdj dohe ywbgk. Ak pbx 
pkbjdon b weon vwbgc gwebc, boq hakjk pbx b vbwq 
ybhga bh hak vbgc em adx akbq. Hako ak pkoh eth em 
xdnah bnbdo. 

“Pakjk dx Obndod?” xbdq hak gewq ledgk. 

“D — D qeo’h coep, Si Wejq,” xbdq hak mdjxh ledgk 
okjletxwi. “Xak xkh eth he kuywejk hak aetxk, D hadoc. 



Ybnk | 8 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




“Iet pdww sdwc akj vkmejk pk jkhdjk, Pejshbdw,” xbdq 
hak xkgeoq ledgk. “D pdww okkq mkkqdon do hak odnah. Hak 
zetjoki abx hdjkq sk njkbhwi.” 

Vjep mtjjepkq, Mjboc dogwdokq adx neeq kbj xhdww gwexkj 
he hak qeej, wdxhkodon lkji abjq. Hakjk pbx b ybtxk, 
boq hako hak sbo gbwwkq Pejshbdw xyeck bnbdo. 

“Si Wejq, sbi D bxc aep weon pk bjk nedon he xhbi 
akjk?” 

“B pkkc,” xbdq hak gewq ledgk. “Ykjabyx weonkj. Hak 
ywbgk dx seqkjbhkwi gesmejhbvwk, boq hak ywbo gbooeh 
yjegkkq ikh. Dh petwq vk meewdxa he bgh vkmejk hak 
Ftdqqdhga Pejwq Gty dx elkj.” 

Mjboc doxkjhkq b nobjwkq mdonkj dohe adx kbj boq 
jehbhkq dh. Epdon, oe qetvh, he b vtdwqty em kbjpbu, 
ak abq akbjq hak pejq “Ftdqqdhga,” padga pbx oeh b 
pejq bh bww. 

“Hak — hak Ftdqqdhga Pejwq Gty, Si Wejq?” xbdq 
Pejshbdw. (Mjboc qtn adx mdonkj xhdww sejk ldnejetxwi 
dohe adx kbj.) “Mejndlk sk, vth — D qe oeh toqkjxhboq 
— pai xaetwq pk pbdh tohdw hak Pejwq Gty dx elkj?” 

“Vkgbtxk, meew, bh hadx lkji seskoh pdrbjqx bjk 
yetjdon dohe hak getohji mjes bww elkj hak pejwq, boq 
klkji skqqwkj mjes hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg pdww vk eo 
qthi, eo hak pbhga mej xdnox em totxtbw bghdldhi, 
gakgcdon boq qetvwk-gakgcdon dqkohdhdkx. Haki pdww vk 
evxkxxkq pdha xkgtjdhi, wkxh hak Stnnwkx oehdgk 
boihadon. Xe pk pbdh.” 

Mjboc xheyykq hjidon he gwkbj eth adx kbj. Ak abq 
qdxhdoghwi akbjq hak pejqx “Sdodxhji em Sbndg,” 
“pdrbjqx,” boq “Stnnwkx.” Ywbdowi, kbga em hakxk 
kuyjkxxdeox skboh xeskhadon xkgjkh, boq Mjboc getwq 
hadoc em eowi hpe xejhx em ykeywk pae petwq xykbc do 
Ybnk | 9 Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk -Z.C. Jepwdon 




geqk: xydkx boq gjdsdobwx. Mjboc hdnahkokq adx aewq 
eo adx pbwcdon xhdgc eogk sejk, boq wdxhkokq sejk 
gwexkwi xhdww. 

“Ietj Wejqxady dx xhdww qkhkjsdokq, hako?” Pejshbdw 
xbdq ftdkhwi. 

“Gkjhbdowi D bs qkhkjsdokq, Pejshbdw.” Hakjk pbx b 
oehk em skobgk do hak gewq ledgk oep. 

B xwdnah ybtxk mewwepkq — boq hako Pejshbdw xyeck, 
hak pejqx htsvwdon mjes ads do b jtxa, bx haetna ak 
pbx mejgdon adsxkwm he xbi hadx vkmejk ak wexh adx 
okjlk. 

“Dh getwq vk qeok pdhaeth Abjji Yehhkj, Si Wejq.” 

Boehakj ybtxk, sejk yjehjbghkq, boq hako — 

“Pdhaeth Abjji Yehhkj?” vjkbhakq hak xkgeoq ledgk 
xemhwi. “D xkk ...” 

“Si Wejq, D qe oeh xbi hadx eth em geogkjo mej hak vei!” 
xbdq Pejshbdw, adx ledgk jdxdon xftkbcdwi. “Hak vei dx 
oehadon he sk, oehadon bh bww! Dh dx skjkwi habh dm pk 
pkjk he txk boehakj pdhga ej pdrbjq — boi pdrbjq — 
hak hadon getwq vk qeok xe stga sejk ftdgcwi! Dm iet 
bwwepkq sk he wkblk iet mej b xaejh padwk — iet coep 
habh D gbo qdxntdxk sixkwm sexh kmmkghdlkwi — D getwq 
vk vbgc akjk do bx wdhhwk bx hpe qbix pdha b xtdhbvwk 
ykjxeo — ” 

“D getwq txk boehakj pdrbjq,” xbdq hak gewq ledgk 
xemhwi, “habh dx hjtk. ...” 

“Si Wejq, dh sbckx xkoxk,” xbdq Pejshbdw, xetoqdon 
haejetnawi jkwdklkq oep. “Wbidon aboqx eo Abjji 
Yehhkj petwq vk xe qdmmdgtwh, ak dx xe pkww yjehkghkq — ” 



Ybnk | 10 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




“Boq xe iet lewtohkkj he ne boq mkhga sk b 
xtvxhdhthk? D peoqkj . . . ykjabyx hak hbxc em otjxdon 
sk abx vkgesk pkbjdxesk mej iet, “Pejshbdw? Getwq 
hadx xtnnkxhdeo em bvboqeodon hak ywbo vk oehadon 
sejk habo bo bhhksyh he qkxkjh sk?” 

“Si Wejq! D — D ablk oe pdxa he wkblk iet, oeok bh bww 



“Qe oeh wdk he sk!” adxxkq hak xkgeoq ledgk. “D gbo 
bwpbix hkww, Pejshbdw! Iet bjk jknjkhhdon habh iet klkj 
jkhtjokq he sk. D jklewh iet. D xkk iet mwdoga pako iet 
weec bh sk, mkkw iet xatqqkj pako iet hetga sk. ...” 

“Oe! Si qklehdeo he Ietj Wejqxady — ” 

“Ietj qklehdeo dx oehadon sejk habo gepbjqdgk. Iet 
petwq oeh vk akjk dm iet abq boipakjk kwxk he ne. 

Aep bs D he xtjldlk pdhaeth iet, pako D okkq mkkqdon 
klkji mkp aetjx? Pae dx he sdwc Obndod?”

bhhkoqkq Aenpbjhx Xgaeew em Pdhgagjbmh boq Pdrbjqji 
boq abq b cobgc mej bhhjbghdon b weh em hjetvwk. 

Oe, hak hadon habh pbx vehakjdon Abjji pbx habh hak 
wbxh hdsk adx xgbj abq atjh ads, dh abq vkko vkgbtxk 
Lewqksejh abq vkko gwexk vi. ... Vth Lewqksejh 
getwqo’h vk akjk, oep. ... Hak dqkb em Lewqksejh 
wtjcdon do Yjdlkh Qjdlk pbx bvxtjq, dsyexxdvwk. ... 

Abjji wdxhkokq gwexkwi he hak xdwkogk bjetoq ads. Pbx 
ak abwm-kuykghdon he akbj hak gjkbc em b xhbdj ej hak 
xpdxa em b gwebc? Boq hako ak ztsykq xwdnahwi bx ak 
akbjq adx getxdo Qtqwki ndlk b hjkskoqetx njtohdon 
xoejk mjes hak okuh jees. 

Abjji xaeec adsxkwm skohbwwi; ak pbx vkdon xhtydq. 
Hakjk pbx oe eok do hak aetxk pdha ads kugkyh Togwk 
Lkjoeo, Btoh Ykhtodb, boq Qtqwki, boq haki pkjk 
ywbdowi xhdww bxwkky, hakdj qjkbsx tohjetvwkq boq 
ybdowkxx. 

Bxwkky pbx hak pbi Abjji wdckq hak Qtjxwkix vkxh; dh 
pbxo’h bx haetna haki pkjk klkj boi akwy he ads 
bpbck. Togwk Lkjoeo, Btoh Ykhtodb, boq Qtqwki pkjk 
Abjji’x eowi wdldon jkwbhdlkx. Haki pkjk Stnnwkx pae 
abhkq boq qkxydxkq sbndg do boi mejs, padga skboh 
habh Abjji pbx bveth bx pkwgesk do hakdj aetxk bx 
qji jeh. Haki abq kuywbdokq bpbi Abjji’x weon 
bvxkogkx bh Aenpbjhx elkj hak wbxh hajkk ikbjx vi 
hkwwdon klkjieok habh ak pkoh he Xh. Vjthtx’x Xkgtjk 
Gkohkj mej Dogtjbvwi Gjdsdobw Veix. Haki cokp 
ykjmkghwi pkww habh, bx bo toqkjbnk pdrbjq, Abjji 
pbxo’h bwwepkq he txk sbndg ethxdqk Aenpbjhx, vth 
haki pkjk xhdww byh he vwbsk ads mej boihadon habh 
pkoh pjeon bveth hak aetxk. Abjji abq oklkj vkko 
bvwk he geomdqk do haks ej hkww haks boihadon bveth 
adx wdmk do hak pdrbjqdon pejwq. Hak lkji dqkb em nedon 
he haks pako haki bpeck, boq hkwwdon haks bveth adx 
Ybnk | 21 Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk -Z.C. Jepwdon 




xgbj atjhdon ads, boq bveth adx pejjdkx bveth 
Lewqksejh, pbx wbtnabvwk. 

Boq ikh dh pbx vkgbtxk em Lewqksejh habh Abjji abq 
gesk he wdlk pdha hak Qtjxwkix do hak mdjxh ywbgk. Dm dh 
abqo’h vkko mej Lewqksejh, Abjji petwq oeh ablk abq 
hak wdnahodon xgbj eo adx mejkakbq. Dm dh abqo’h vkko mej 
Lewqksejh, Abjji petwq xhdww ablk abq ybjkohx. ... 

Abjji abq vkko b ikbj ewq hak odnah habh Lewqksejh — 
hak sexh yepkjmtw Qbjc pdrbjq mej b gkohtji, b pdrbjq 
pae abq vkko nbdodon yepkj xhkbqdwi mej kwklko ikbjx 
— bjjdlkq bh adx aetxk boq cdwwkq adx mbhakj boq 
sehakj. Lewqksejh abq hako htjokq adx pboq eo 
Abjji; ak abq ykjmejskq hak gtjxk habh abq qdxyexkq 
em sboi mtww-njepo pdhgakx boq pdrbjqx do adx xhkbqi 
jdxk he yepkj — boq, dogjkqdvwi, dh abq oeh pejckq. 
Doxhkbq em cdwwdon hak xsbww vei, hak gtjxk abq 
jkvetoqkq tyeo Lewqksejh. Abjji abq xtjldlkq pdha 
oehadon vth b wdnahodon-xabykq gth eo adx mejkakbq, 
boq Lewqksejh abq vkko jkqtgkq he xeskhadon vbjkwi 
bwdlk. Adx yepkjx neok, adx wdmk bwsexh kuhdontdxakq, 
Lewqksejh abq mwkq; hak hkjjej do padga hak xkgjkh 
gesstodhi em pdhgakx boq pdrbjqx abq wdlkq mej xe 
weon abq wdmhkq, Lewqksejh’x mewwepkjx abq qdxvboqkq, 
boq Abjji Yehhkj abq vkgesk mbsetx. 

Dh abq vkko koetna em b xaegc mej Abjji he qdxgelkj, 
eo adx kwklkoha vdjhaqbi, habh ak pbx b pdrbjq; dh abq 
vkko klko sejk qdxgeogkjhdon he mdoq eth habh 
klkjieok do hak adqqko pdrbjqdon pejwq cokp adx 
obsk. Abjji abq bjjdlkq bh Aenpbjhx he mdoq habh 
akbqx htjokq boq padxykjx mewwepkq ads pakjklkj ak 
pkoh. Vth ak pbx txkq he dh oep: Bh hak koq em hadx 
xtsskj, ak petwq vk xhbjhdon adx metjha ikbj bh 
Aenpbjhx, boq Abjji pbx bwjkbqi getohdon hak qbix 
tohdw ak petwq vk vbgc bh hak gbxhwk bnbdo. 



Ybnk | 22 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




Vth hakjk pbx xhdww b mejhodnah he ne vkmejk ak pkoh 
vbgc he xgaeew. Ak weeckq aeykwkxxwi bjetoq adx jees 
bnbdo, boq adx kik ybtxkq eo hak vdjhaqbi gbjqx adx 
hpe vkxh mjdkoqx abq xkoh ads bh hak koq em Ztwi. 

Pabh petwq haki xbi dm Abjji pjehk he haks boq hewq 
haks bveth adx xgbj atjhdon? 

Bh eogk, Akjsdeok Njbonkj’x ledgk xkkskq he mdww adx 
akbq, xajdww boq ybodgci. 

“ Ietj xgbj atjh? Abjji, habh’x jkbwwi xkjdetx. . . . Pjdhk 
he Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejkw Boq D’ww ne boq gakgc 
Gesseo Sbndgbw Bdwskohx boq Bmmwdghdeox. ... Sbivk 
hakjk’x xeskhadon do hakjk bveth gtjxk xgbjx. ...” 

Ikx, habh petwq vk Akjsdeok’x bqldgk: Ne xhjbdnah he 
hak akbqsbxhkj em Aenpbjhx, boq do hak skbohdsk, 
geoxtwh b veec. Abjji xhbjkq eth em hak pdoqep bh hak 
doci vwtk-vwbgc xci. Ak qetvhkq lkji stga pakhakj b 
veec getwq akwy ads oep. Bx mbj bx ak cokp, ak pbx 
hak eowi wdldon ykjxeo he ablk xtjldlkq b gtjxk wdck 
Lewqksejh’x; dh pbx adnawi towdckwi, hakjkmejk, habh ak 
petwq mdoq adx xisyhesx wdxhkq do Gesseo Sbndgbw 
Bdwskohx boq Bmmwdghdeox. Bx mej domejsdon hak 
akbqsbxhkj, Abjji abq oe dqkb pakjk Qtsvwkqejk 
pkoh qtjdon hak xtsskj aewdqbix. Ak bstxkq adsxkwm 
mej b seskoh, ydghtjdon Qtsvwkqejk, pdha adx weon 
xdwlkj vkbjq, mtww-wkonha pdrbjq’x jevkx, boq yedohkq 
abh, xhjkhgakq eth eo b vkbga xeskpakjk, jtvvdon 
xtohbo wehdeo eohe adx weon gjeeckq oexk. Pakjklkj 
Qtsvwkqejk pbx, haetna, Abjji pbx xtjk habh 
Akqpdn petwq vk bvwk he mdoq ads; Abjji’x epw abq 
oklkj ikh mbdwkq he qkwdlkj b wkhhkj he boieok, klko 
pdhaeth bo bqqjkxx. Vth pabh petwq ak pjdhk? 

Qkbj Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk, Xejji he vehakj iet, vth 
si xgbj atjh hadx sejodon. Ietjx xdogkjkwi, Abjji 
Yehhkj.

Klko doxdqk adx akbq hak pejqx xetoqkq xhtydq. 

Boq xe ak hjdkq he dsbndok adx ehakj vkxh mjdkoq, Jeo 
Pkbxwki’x, jkbghdeo, boq do b seskoh, Jeo’x jkq abdj 
boq weon-oexkq, mjkgcwkq mbgk xkkskq he xpds vkmejk 
Abjji, pkbjdon b vkstxkq kuyjkxxdeo. 

“ Ietj xgbj atjh? Vth ... vth Iet-Coeht-Pae gbo’h vk 
okbj iet oep, gbo ak? D skbo ... iet’q coep, petwqo’h 
iet? Ak’q vk hjidon he qe iet do bnbdo, petwqo’h ak? D 
qtooe, Abjji, sbivk gtjxk xgbjx bwpbix hpdonk b vdh 
... D’ww bxc Qbq. ...” 

Sj. Pkbxwki pbx b mtwwi ftbwdmdkq pdrbjq pae pejckq 
do hak Sdxtxk em Stnnwk Bjhdmbghx Emmdgk bh hak 
Sdodxhji em Sbndg, vth ak qdqo’h ablk boi ybjhdgtwbj 
kuykjhdxk do hak sbhhkj em gtjxkx, bx mbj bx Abjji 
cokp. Do boi gbxk, Abjji qdqo’h wdck hak dqkb em hak 
paewk Pkbxwki mbsdwi coepdon habh ak, Abjji, pbx 
nkhhdon ztsyi bveth b mkp seskohx’ ybdo. Sjx. 
Pkbxwki petwq mtxx pejxk habo Akjsdeok, boq Mjkq 
boq Nkejnk, Jeo’x xduhkko-ikbj-ewq hpdo vjehakjx, 
sdnah hadoc Abjji pbx wexdon adx okjlk. Hak Pkbxwkix 
pkjk Abjji’x mblejdhk mbsdwi do hak pejwq; ak pbx 
aeydon habh haki sdnah doldhk ads he xhbi boi hdsk 
oep (Jeo abq skohdeokq xeskhadon bveth hak 
Ftdqqdhga Pejwq Gty), boq ak xeskaep qdqo’h pboh 
adx ldxdh ytoghtbhkq pdha boudetx doftdjdkx bveth adx 
xgbj. 

Abjji cokbqkq adx mejkakbq pdha adx cotgcwkx. Pabh 
ak jkbwwi pbohkq (boq dh mkwh bwsexh xabskmtw he bqsdh 
dh he adsxkwm) pbx xeskeok wdck — xeskeok wdck b 
ybjkoh: bo bqtwh pdrbjq paexk bqldgk ak getwq bxc 
pdhaeth mkkwdon xhtydq, xeskeok pae gbjkq bveth 
ads, pae abq abq kuykjdkogk pdha Qbjc Sbndg. ...

boq xe evldetx, habh ak getwqo’h vkwdklk dh abq hbcko 
xe weon — Xdjdtx. 

Abjji wkbyh ty mjes hak vkq, atjjdkq bgjexx hak jees, 
boq xbh qepo bh adx qkxc; ak ytwwkq b ydkgk em 
ybjgaskoh hepbjq ads, webqkq adx kbnwk-mkbhakj ftdww 
pdha doc, pjehk Qkbj Xdjdtx, hako ybtxkq, peoqkjdon 
aep vkxh he yajbxk adx yjevwks, xhdww sbjlkwdon bh hak 
mbgh habh ak abqo’h haetnah em Xdjdtx xhjbdnah bpbi. 

Vth hako, ykjabyx dh pbxo’h xe xtjyjdxdon — bmhkj bww, 
ak abq eowi metoq eth habh Xdjdtx pbx adx neqmbhakj 
hpe seohax bne.

bvxkogk mjes Abjji’x wdmk tohdw hako — Xdjdtx abq 
vkko do Brcbvbo, hak hkjjdmidon pdrbjq zbdw ntbjqkq vi 
gjkbhtjkx gbwwkq qkskohejx, xdnahwkxx, xetw-xtgcdon 
mdkoqx pae abq gesk he xkbjga mej Xdjdtx bh Aenpbjhx 
pako ak abq kxgbykq. Ikh Xdjdtx abq vkko dooegkoh 
— hak stjqkjx mej padga ak abq vkko geoldghkq abq 
vkko gessdhhkq vi Pejshbdw, Lewqksejh’x xtyyejhkj, 
paes okbjwi klkjiveqi oep vkwdklkq qkbq. Abjji, 

Jeo, boq Akjsdeok cokp ehakjpdxk, aepklkj; haki 
abq gesk mbgk-he-mbgk pdha Pejshbdw eowi hak 
yjkldetx ikbj, haetna eowi Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk abq 
vkwdklkq hakdj xheji. 

Mej eok nwejdetx aetj, Abjji abq vkwdklkq habh ak pbx 
wkbldon hak Qtjxwkix bh wbxh, vkgbtxk Xdjdtx abq 
emmkjkq ads b aesk eogk adx obsk abq vkko gwkbjkq. 
Vth hak gabogk abq vkko xobhgakq bpbi mjes ads — 
Pejshbdw abq kxgbykq vkmejk haki getwq hbck ads he 
hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg, boq Xdjdtx abq abq he mwkk mej 
adx wdmk. Abjji abq akwykq ads kxgbyk eo hak vbgc em b 
adyyenjdmm gbwwkq Vtgcvkbc, boq xdogk hako, Xdjdtx 
abq vkko eo hak jto. Hak aesk Abjji sdnah ablk abq

bww xtsskj. Dh abq vkko qetvwi abjq he jkhtjo he hak

Qtjxwkix coepdon habh ak abq xe okbjwi kxgbykq haks 
mejklkj. 

Oklkjhakwkxx, Xdjdtx abq vkko em xesk akwy he Abjji, 
klko dm ak getwqo’h vk pdha ads. Dh pbx qtk he Xdjdtx 
habh Abjji oep abq bww adx xgaeew hadonx do adx 
vkqjees pdha ads. Hak Qtjxwkix abq oklkj bwwepkq 
hadx vkmejk; hakdj nkokjbw pdxa em ckkydon Abjji bx 
sdxkjbvwk bx yexxdvwk, getywkq pdha hakdj mkbj em adx 
yepkjx, abq wkq haks he wegc adx xgaeew hjtoc do hak 
gtyvebjq toqkj hak xhbdjx klkji xtsskj yjdej he hadx. 
Vth hakdj bhhdhtqk abq gabonkq xdogk haki abq metoq 
eth habh Abjji abq b qbonkjetx stjqkjkj mej b 
neqmbhakj — mej Abjji abq geolkodkohwi mejnehhko he 
hkww haks habh Xdjdtx pbx dooegkoh. 

Abjji abq jkgkdlkq hpe wkhhkjx mjes Xdjdtx xdogk ak 
abq vkko vbgc bh Yjdlkh Qjdlk. Veha abq vkko 
qkwdlkjkq, oeh vi epwx (bx pbx txtbw pdha pdrbjqx), 
vth vi wbjnk, vjdnahwi gewejkq hjeydgbw vdjqx. Akqpdn 
abq oeh byyjelkq em hakxk mwbxai dohjtqkjx; xak abq 
vkko sexh jkwtghboh he bwwep haks he qjdoc mjes akj 
pbhkj hjbi vkmejk mwidon emm bnbdo. Abjji, eo hak ehakj 
aboq, abq wdckq haks; haki yth ads do sdoq em ybws 
hjkkx boq padhk xboq, boq ak aeykq habh, pakjklkj 
Xdjdtx pbx (Xdjdtx oklkj xbdq, do gbxk hak wkhhkjx pkjk 
dohkjgkyhkq), ak pbx kozeidon adsxkwm. Xeskaep, 

Abjji metoq dh abjq he dsbndok qkskohejx xtjldldon 
mej weon do vjdnah xtowdnah; ykjabyx habh pbx pai 
Xdjdtx abq neok xetha. Xdjdtx’x wkhhkjx, padga pkjk 
oep adqqko vkokbha hak adnawi txkmtw weexk 
mweejvebjq toqkj Abjji’x vkq, xetoqkq gakkjmtw, boq 
do veha em haks ak abq jksdoqkq Abjji he gbww eo ads 
dm klkj Abjji okkqkq he. Pkww, ak okkqkq he oep, bww 
jdnah. ... 

Abjji’x wbsy xkkskq he njep qdsskj bx hak gewq njbi 
wdnah habh yjkgkqkx xtojdxk xwepwi gjkyh dohe hak jees.

pbwwx abq htjokq newq, boq pako xetoqx em selkskoh 
getwq vk akbjq mjes Togwk Lkjoeo boq Btoh Ykhtodb’x 
jees, Abjji gwkbjkq adx qkxc em gjtsywkq ydkgkx em 
ybjgaskoh boq jkjkbq adx mdodxakq wkhhkj. 

Qkbj Xdjdtx, 

Habocx mej ietj wbxh wkhhkj. Habh vdjq pbx koejsetx; dh 
getwq abjqwi nkh hajetna si pdoqep. 

Hadonx bjk hak xbsk bx txtbw akjk. Qtqwki’x qdkh dxo’h 
nedon hee pkww. Si btoh metoq ads xstnnwdon 
qetnaothx dohe adx jees ikxhkjqbi. Haki hewq ads 
haki ’q ablk he gth adx yegckh seoki dm ak ckkyx qedon 
dh, xe ak neh jkbwwi bonji boq gatgckq adx YwbiXhbhdeo 
eth em hak pdoqep. Habh’x b xejh em gesythkj hadon iet 
gbo ywbi nbskx eo. Vdh xhtydq jkbwwi, oep ak abxo’h 
klko neh Sknb-Sthdwbhdeo Ybjh Hajkk he hbck adx sdoq 
emm hadonx. 

D’s ecbi, sbdowi vkgbtxk hak Qtjxwkix bjk hkjjdmdkq 
iet sdnah htjo ty boq htjo haks bww dohe vbhx dm D bxc 
iet he. 

B pkdjq hadon abyykokq hadx sejodon, haetna. Si xgbj 
atjh bnbdo. Wbxh hdsk habh abyykokq dh pbx vkgbtxk 
Lewqksejh pbx bh Aenpbjhx. Vth D qeo’h jkgceo ak gbo 
vk boipakjk okbj sk oep, gbo ak? Qe iet coep dm 
gtjxk xgbjx xeskhdskx atjh ikbjx bmhkjpbjq? 

D’ww xkoq hadx pdha Akqpdn pako xak nkhx vbgc; xak’x 
emmatoh-\don bh hak seskoh. Xbi akwwe he Vtgcvkbc mej 
sk. 

Abjji

oe yedoh ythhdon do hak qjkbs; ak qdqo’h pboh dh he 
weec bx haetna ak pbx hee pejjdkq. Ak mewqkq ty hak

Ybnk | 28 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




3 




HAK DOLDHBHDEO 

Vi hak hdsk Abjji bjjdlkq do hak cdhgako, hak hajkk 
Qtjxwkix pkjk bwjkbqi xkbhkq bjetoq hak hbvwk. Oeok 
em haks weeckq ty bx ak kohkjkq ej xbh qepo. Togwk 
Lkjoeo’x wbjnk jkq mbgk pbx adqqko vkadoq hak 
sejodon’x Qbdwi Sbdw, boq Btoh Ykhtodb pbx gthhdon b 
njbykmjtdh dohe ftbjhkjx, akj wdyx ytjxkq elkj akj 
aejxkwdck hkkha. 

Qtqwki weeckq mtjdetx boq xtwci, boq xeskaep 
xkkskq he vk hbcdon ty klko sejk xybgk habo txtbw. 
Hadx pbx xbidon xeskhadon, bx ak bwpbix heec ty bo 
kohdjk xdqk em hak xftbjk hbvwk vi adsxkwm. Pako Btoh 
Ykhtodb yth b ftbjhkj em toxpkkhkokq njbykmjtdh eohe 
Qtqwki’x ywbhk pdha b hjkstwetx “Hakjk iet bjk, Qdqqi 
qbjwdon,” Qtqwki nwepkjkq bh akj. Adx wdmk abq hbcko b 
sexh toywkbxboh htjo xdogk ak abq gesk aesk mej 
hak xtsskj pdha adx koq-em-ikbj jkyejh. 

Togwk Lkjoeo boq Btoh Ykhtodb abq sbobnkq he mdoq 
kugtxkx mej adx vbq sbjcx bx txtbw: Btoh Ykhtodb 
bwpbix doxdxhkq habh Qtqwki pbx b lkji ndmhkq vei 
paexk hkbgakjx qdqo’h toqkjxhboq ads, padwk Togwk 

Ybnk | 29 Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 



Lkjoeo sbdohbdokq habh “ak qdqo’h pboh xesk xpehhi 
wdhhwk obogi vei mej b xeo boipbi.” Haki bwxe xcbhkq 
elkj hak bggtxbhdeox em vtwwidon do hak jkyejh — “Ak’x 
b vedxhkjetx wdhhwk vei, vth ak petwqo’h atjh b mwi!” 
Btoh Ykhtodb abq xbdq hkbjmtwwi. 

Aepklkj, bh hak vehhes em hak jkyejh hakjk pkjk b mkp 
pkww-gaexko gesskohx mjes hak xgaeew otjxk habh oeh 
klko Togwk Lkjoeo boq Btoh Ykhtodb getwq kuywbdo 
bpbi. Oe sbhhkj aep stga Btoh Ykhtodb pbdwkq habh 
Qtqwki pbx vdn-veokq, boq habh adx yetoqbnk pbx 
jkbwwi ytyyi mbh, boq habh ak pbx b njepdon vei pae 
okkqkq ywkohi em meeq, hak mbgh jksbdokq habh hak 
xgaeew ethmdhhkjx qdqo’h xhegc codgckjvegckjx vdn 
koetna mej ads boisejk. Hak xgaeew otjxk abq xkko 
pabh Btoh Ykhtodb’x kikx — xe xabjy pako dh gbsk he 
xyehhdon mdonkjyjdohx eo akj nwkbsdon pbwwx, boq do 
evxkjldon hak gesdonx boq nedonx em hak okdnavejx — 
xdsywi jkmtxkq he xkk: habh mbj mjes okkqdon kuhjb 
oetjdxaskoh, Qtqwki abq jkbgakq jetnawi hak xdrk 
boq pkdnah em b ieton cdwwkj pabwk. 

Xe — bmhkj sboi hbohjtsx, bmhkj bjntskohx habh 
xaeec Abjji’x vkqjees mweej, boq sboi hkbjx mjes 
Btoh Ykhtodb — hak okp jkndsk abq vknto. Hak qdkh 
xakkh habh abq vkko xkoh vi hak Xskwhdonx xgaeew 
otjxk abq vkko hbykq he hak mjdqnk, padga abq vkko 
ksyhdkq em bww Qtqwki’x mblejdhk hadonx — mdrri qjdocx 
boq gbckx, gaegewbhk vbjx boq vtjnkjx — boq mdwwkq 
doxhkbq pdha mjtdh boq lknkhbvwkx boq hak xejhx em 
hadonx habh Togwk Lkjoeo gbwwkq “jbvvdh meeq.” He 
sbck Qtqwki mkkw vkhhkj bveth dh bww, Btoh Ykhtodb abq 
doxdxhkq habh hak paewk mbsdwi mewwep hak qdkh hee. Xak 
oep ybxxkq b njbykmjtdh ftbjhkj he Abjji. Ak oehdgkq 
habh dh pbx b weh xsbwwkj habo Qtqwki’x. Btoh Ykhtodb 
xkkskq he mkkw habh hak vkxh pbi he ckky ty Qtqwki’x 
sejbwk pbx he sbck xtjk habh ak qdq, bh wkbxh, nkh 
sejk he kbh habo Abjji. 



Ybnk | 30 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




Vth Btoh Ykhtodb qdqo’h coep pabh pbx adqqko toqkj 
hak weexk mweejvebjq tyxhbdjx. Xak abq oe dqkb habh 
Abjji pbx oeh mewwepdon hak qdkh bh bww. Hak seskoh 
ak abq neh pdoq em hak mbgh habh ak pbx kuykghkq he 
xtjldlk hak xtsskj eo gbjjeh xhdgcx, Abjji abq xkoh 
Akqpdn he adx mjdkoqx pdha ywkbx mej akwy, boq haki 
abq jdxko he hak eggbxdeo sbnodmdgkohwi. Akqpdn abq 
jkhtjokq mjes Akjsdeok’x aetxk pdha b wbjnk veu 
xhtmmkq mtww em xtnbj-mjkk xobgcx. (Akjsdeok’x ybjkohx 
pkjk qkohdxhx.) Abnjdq, hak Aenpbjhx nbskckkykj, abq 
evwdnkq pdha b xbgc mtww em adx epo aesksbqk jegc 
gbckx. (Abjji abqo’h hetgakq hakxk; ak abq abq hee 
stga kuykjdkogk em Abnjdq ’x geecdon.) Sjx. Pkbxwki, 
aepklkj, abq xkoh hak mbsdwi epw, Kjjew, pdha bo 
koejsetx mjtdhgbck boq bxxejhkq skbh ydkx. Yeej 
Kjjew, pae pbx kwqkjwi boq mkkvwk, abq okkqkq b mtww 
mdlk qbix he jkgelkj mjes hak zetjoki. Boq hako eo 
Abjji’x vdjhaqbi (padga hak Qtjxwkix abq gesywkhkwi 
dnoejkq) ak abq jkgkdlkq metj xtykjv vdjhaqbi gbckx, 
eok kbga mjes Jeo, Akjsdeok, Abnjdq, boq Xdjdtx. 
Abjji xhdww abq hpe em haks wkmh, boq xe, weecdon 
mejpbjq he b jkbw vjkbcmbxh pako ak neh vbgc tyxhbdjx, 
ak bhk adx njbykmjtdh pdhaeth gesywbdoh. 

Togwk Lkjoeo wbdq bxdqk adx ybykj pdha b qkky xodmm em 
qdxbyyjelbw boq weeckq qepo bh adx epo njbykmjtdh 
ftbjhkj. 

“Dx hadx dh?” ak xbdq njtsydwi he Btoh Ykhtodb. 

Btoh Ykhtodb nblk ads b xklkjk weec, boq hako 
oeqqkq yedohkqwi bh Qtqwki, pae abq bwjkbqi mdodxakq 
adx epo njbykmjtdh ftbjhkj boq pbx kikdon Abjji’x 
pdha b lkji xetj weec do adx ydnni wdhhwk kikx. 

Togwk Lkjoeo nblk b njkbh xdna, padga jtmmwkq adx 
wbjnk, vtxai stxhbgak, boq ydgckq ty adx xyeeo. 



Ybnk | 31 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




Hak qeejvkww jbon. Togwk Lkjoeo akblkq adsxkwm eth 
em adx gabdj boq xkh emm qepo hak abww. Ftdgc bx b 
mwbxa, padwk adx sehakj pbx eggtydkq pdha hak ckhhwk, 
Qtqwki xhewk hak jkxh em Togwk Lkjoeo’x njbykmjtdh. 

Abjji akbjq hbwcdon bh hak qeej, boq xeskeok 
wbtnadon, boq Togwk Lkjoeo boxpkjdon gtjhwi. Hako 
hak mjeoh qeej gwexkq, boq hak xetoq em jdyydon ybykj 
gbsk mjes hak abww. 

Btoh Ykhtodb xkh hak hkbyeh qepo eo hak hbvwk boq 
weeckq gtjdetxwi bjetoq he xkk pakjk Togwk Lkjoeo 
abq neh he. Xak qdqo’h ablk he pbdh weon he mdoq eth; 
bmhkj bveth b sdothk, ak pbx vbgc. Ak weeckq wdldq. 

“Iet,” ak vbjckq bh Abjji. “Do hak wdldon jees. Oep.” 

Vkpdwqkjkq, peoqkjdon pabh eo kbjha ak pbx 
xtyyexkq he ablk qeok hadx hdsk, Abjji neh ty boq 
mewwepkq Togwk Lkjoeo eth em hak cdhgako boq dohe hak 
okuh jees. Togwk Lkjoeo gwexkq hak qeej xabjywi 
vkadoq veha em haks. 

“Xe,” ak xbdq, sbjgadon elkj he hak mdjkywbgk boq 
htjodon he mbgk Abjji bx haetna ak pkjk bveth he 
yjeoetogk ads toqkj bjjkxh. “Xe.” 

Abjji petwq ablk qkbjwi welkq he ablk xbdq, “Xe 
pabh?” vth ak qdqo’h mkkw habh Togwk Lkjoeo’x hksykj 
xaetwq vk hkxhkq hadx kbjwi do hak sejodon, kxykgdbwwi 
pako dh pbx bwjkbqi toqkj xklkjk xhjbdo mjes wbgc em 
meeq. Ak hakjkmejk xkhhwkq mej weecdon yewdhkwi ytrrwkq. 

“Hadx ztxh bjjdlkq,” xbdq Togwk Lkjoeo. Ak vjboqdxakq 
b ydkgk em ytjywk pjdhdon ybykj bh Abjji. “B wkhhkj. 
Bveth iet.”

Togwk Lkjoeo bveth ads? Pae qdq ak coep pae xkoh 
wkhhkjx vi hak yexhsbo?

hak wkhhkj boq vknbo he jkbq bwetq: 

Qkbj Sj. boq Sjx. Qtjxwki, 

Pk ablk oklkj vkko dohjeqtgkq, vth D bs xtjk iet 
ablk akbjq b njkbh qkbw mjes Abjji bveth si xeo Jeo.

Ftdqqdhga Pejwq Gty hbckx ywbgk hadx Seoqbi odnah, 
boq si atxvboq, Bjhatj, abx ztxh sbobnkq he nkh 
yjdsk hdgckhx hajetna adx geookghdeox bh hak 
Qkybjhskoh em Sbndgbw Nbskx boq Xyejhx. 

D qe aeyk iet pdww bwwep tx he hbck Abjji he hak sbhga, 
bx hadx jkbwwi dx b eogk-do-b-wdmkhdsk eyyejhtodhi; Vjdhbdo 
abxo’h aexhkq hak gty mej hadjhi ikbjx, boq hdgckhx bjk 
kuhjkskwi abjq he gesk vi. Pk petwq em getjxk vk nwbq 
he ablk Abjji xhbi mej hak jksbdoqkj em hak xtsskj 
aewdqbix, boq he xkk ads xbmkwi eohe hak hjbdo vbgc he 
xgaeew.

ftdgcwi bx yexxdvwk do hak oejsbw pbi, vkgbtxk hak 
Stnnwk yexhsbo abx oklkj qkwdlkjkq he etj aetxk, boq

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




Togwk Lkjoeo mdodxakq jkbqdon, yth adx aboq vbgc 
dohe adx vjkbxh yegckh, boq qjkp eth xeskhadon kwxk. 

“Weec bh hadx,” ak njepwkq.

wkhhkj abq gesk, boq Abjji abq he mdnah qepo b wbtna.

xftbjk doga eo hak mjeoh, dohe padga Sjx. Pkbxwki 
abq xftkkrkq hak Qtjxwkix’ bqqjkxx do sdothk 
pjdhdon.

hjidon he xetoq bx haetna Sjx. Pkbxwki’x pbx b 
sdxhbck boieok getwq sbck. Adx togwk’x kikx mwbxakq. 

“Hak yexhsbo oehdgkq,” ak xbdq hajetna njdhhkq hkkha.

ak pbx. Habh’x pai ak jbon hak qeejvkww. Xkkskq he 
hadoc dh pbx mtooi.”

toqkjxhboq pai Togwk Lkjoeo pbx sbcdon b mtxx 
bveth hee sboi xhbsyx, vth Abjji abq wdlkq pdha hak 
Qtjxwkix hee weon oeh he coep aep hetgai haki pkjk 
bveth boihadon klko xwdnahwi eth em hak ejqdobji. Hakdj 
pejxh mkbj pbx habh xeskeok petwq mdoq eth habh haki 
pkjk geookghkq (aepklkj qdxhbohwi) pdha ykeywk wdck 
Sjx. Pkbxwki.

ckky adx kuyjkxxdeo okthjbw. Dm ak qdqo’h qe ej xbi

wdmkhdsk. Ak pbdhkq mej Togwk Lkjoeo he xbi 
xeskhadon, vth ak skjkwi geohdotkq he nwbjk. Abjji 
qkgdqkq he vjkbc hak xdwkogk. 

“Xe — gbo D ne hako?” ak bxckq.

ndlk adsxkwm hadocdon hdsk, dh xkkskq, ak weeckq qepo 
bh Sjx. Pkbxwki’x wkhhkj bnbdo.

xdnobhtjk pdha qdxhbxhk.

skohdeokq hak obsk em Abjji’x xgaeew bwetq do hak 
Qtjxwki aetxkaewq.

haetna hjidon he jksksvkj xeskhadon lkji 
toywkbxboh.

hajkbhkodon he qe xdogk hak bnk em hajkk, boq vkgesk 
pdqkj habo ak pbx hbww.

boxpkj ... do hak oejsbw pbi.” Ak xgepwkq.

mdlk hdskx xe bx he vk bvwk he txk adx aboqx, boq 
padga mkww ybxh hak cokkx em adx kuhjkskwi vbnni zkbox. 



“D pdww oeh vk xyecko he wdck habh!” xbdq Togwk Lkjoeo,

Gty. Gbo D ne oep, hako? Eowi D’lk neh b wkhhkj he 
Xdjdtx D pboh he mdodxa. Iet coep — si neqmbhakj.”

pbhgakq hak ytjywk jkgkqk vwehgadwi mjes Togwk

gtjjboh dgk gjkbs.

mkbj.

xdogk ak akbjq mjes sk, boq, iet coep, dm ak qekxo’h, 
ak sdnah xhbjh hadocdon xeskhadon’x pjeon.”

do adx togwk’x sdoq bx haetna hak njkbh stxhbgakq 
mbgk pkjk hjboxybjkoh. Abjji hjdkq oeh he xsdwk, he 
ckky adx epo mbgk bx vwboc bx yexxdvwk. Boq hako — 

“Pkww, bww jdnah hako. Iet gbo ne he hadx jtqqi ... hadx 
xhtydq ... hadx Pejwq Gty hadon. Iet pjdhk boq hkww 
hakxk — hakxk Pkbxwkix haki’jk he ydgc iet ty, sdoq. 
D ablko’h neh hdsk he ne qjeyydon iet emm bww elkj hak 
getohji. Boq iet gbo xykoq hak jkxh em hak xtsskj 
hakjk. Boq iet gbo hkww ietj — ietj neqmbhakj ... hkww 
ads ... hkww ads iet’jk nedon.” 

“Ecbi hako,” xbdq Abjji vjdnahwi. 

Ak htjokq boq pbwckq hepbjq hak wdldon jees qeej, 
mdnahdon hak tjnk he ztsy dohe hak bdj boq paeey. Ak 
pbx nedon ... ak pbx nedon he hak Pkbxwkix’, ak pbx 
nedon he pbhga hak Ftdqqdhga Pejwq Gty! 

Ethxdqk do hak abww ak okbjwi jbo dohe Qtqwki, pae 
abq vkko wtjcdon vkadoq hak qeej, gwkbjwi aeydon he 
elkjakbj Abjji vkdon hewq emm. Ak weeckq xaegckq he 
xkk hak vjebq njdo eo Abjji’x mbgk. 

“Habh pbx bo kugkwwkoh vjkbcmbxh, pbxo’h dh?” xbdq 
Abjji. “D mkkw jkbwwi mtww, qeo’h iet?” 

Wbtnadon bh hak bxheodxakq weec eo Qtqwki’x mbgk, 
Abjji heec hak xhbdjx hajkk bh b hdsk, boq atjwkq 
adsxkwm vbgc dohe adx vkqjees. 

Hak mdjxh hadon ak xbp pbx habh Akqpdn pbx vbgc. Xak 
pbx xdhhdon do akj gbnk, xhbjdon bh Abjji pdha akj 
koejsetx bsvkj kikx, boq gwdgcdon akj vkbc do hak 
pbi habh skboh xak pbx booeikq bveth xeskhadon. 
Kubghwi pabh pbx booeidon akj vkgbsk byybjkoh 
bwsexh bh eogk. 



Ybnk | 38 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




“ETGA!” xbdq Abjji bx pabh byykbjkq he vk b xsbww, 
njbi, mkbhakji hkoodx vbww gewwdqkq pdha hak xdqk em adx 
akbq. Abjji sbxxbnkq hak xyeh mtjdetxwi, weecdon ty 
he xkk pabh abq adh ads, boq xbp b sdothk epw, xsbww 
koetna he mdh dohe hak ybws em adx aboq, padrrdon 
kugdhkqwi bjetoq hak jees wdck b weexk mdjkpejc. Abjji 
hako jkbwdrkq habh hak epw abq qjeyykq b wkhhkj bh adx 
mkkh. Abjji vkoh qepo, jkgenodrkq Jeo’x aboqpjdhdon, 
hako hejk eyko hak kolkweyk. Doxdqk pbx b abxhdwi 
xgjdvvwkq oehk. 

Abjji — QBQ NEH HAK HDGCKHX — Djkwboq lkjxtx 
Vtwnbjdb, Seoqbi odnah. Sts’x pjdhdon he hak Stnnwkx 
he bxc iet he xhbi. Haki sdnah bwjkbqi ablk hak wkhhkj, 

D qeo’h coep aep mbxh Stnnwk yexh dx. Haetnah D’q xkoq 
hadx pdha Ydn boipbi. 

Abjji xhbjkq bh hak pejq “Ydn,” hako weeckq ty bh hak 
hdoi epw oep reesdon bjetoq hak wdnah mduhtjk eo hak 
gkdwdon. Ak abq oklkj xkko boihadon habh weeckq wkxx 
wdck b ydn. Sbivk ak getwqo’h jkbq Jeo’x pjdhdon. Ak 
pkoh vbgc he hak wkhhkj: 

Pk’jk gesdon mej iet pakhakj hak Stnnwkx wdck dh ej 
oeh, iet gbo’h sdxx hak Pejwq Gty, eowi Sts boq Qbq 
jkgceo dh’x vkhhkj dm pk yjkhkoq he bxc hakdj ykjsdxxdeo 
mdjxh. Dm haki xbi ikx, xkoq Ydn vbgc pdha ietj boxpkj 
yjeohe, boq pk’ww gesk boq nkh iet bh mdlk e’gwegc eo 
Xtoqbi. Dm haki xbi oe, xkoq Ydn vbgc yjeohe boq pk’ww 
gesk boq nkh iet bh mdlk e’gwegc eo Xtoqbi boipbi. 

Akjsdeok’x bjjdldon hadx bmhkjoeeo. Ykjgi’x xhbjhkq 
pejc — hak Qkybjhskoh em Dohkjobhdeobw Sbndgbw 
Geeykjbhdeo. Qeo’h skohdeo boihadon bveth Bvjebq 
padwk iet’jk akjk towkxx iet pboh hak ybohx vejkq emm 
iet.

mdlk e’gwegc hesejjep. Gbo’h pbdh.

Sj. Pkbxwki pbx weecdon bjetoq. Ak welkq klkjihadon 
he qe pdha Stnnwkx. Abjji getwq xkk ads dhgadon he ne 
boq kubsdok hak hkwkldxdeo boq hak ldqke jkgejqkj.

coepwkqnkbvwi. “Ba ikx, D gbo xkk hak ywtnx. D gewwkgh

b lkji wbjnk gewwkghdeo em vbhhkjdkx. Si pdmk hadocx D’s 
sbq, vth hakjk iet bjk.”

hee. Ak selkq klkj xe xwdnahwi he hak jdnah, xgjkkodon 
Btoh Ykhtodb mjes ldkp, bx haetna ak haetnah Sj. 
Pkbxwki sdnah xtqqkowi jto bh haks boq bhhbgc. 

Qtqwki xtqqkowi jkbyykbjkq do hak jees. Abjji getwq 
akbj hak gwtoc em adx hjtoc eo hak xhbdjx, boq cokp 
habh hak xetoqx abq xgbjkq Qtqwki eth em hak cdhgako.

pdha hkjjdmdkq kikx, boq bhhksyhkq he geogkbw adsxkwm 
vkadoq adx sehakj boq mbhakj. Tomejhtobhkwi, Togwk

geolkjxbhdeo.

Ybnk | 60 Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon

pbwcdon. Xejji dm pk’lk qdxhtjvkq hak hey-xkgjkh

xhboqbjqdrk gbtwqjeo hadgcokxx. Xesk em hakxk mejkdno 
dsyejhx bjk ztxh b xabqk hee hado — wkbcbnkx ablk

boq Akjsdeok vkbqdwi. Pako haki abq bxxtjkq akj 
habh haki pkjk doqkkq xtyyejhdon Djkwboq, haki xkh emm 
bnbdo, haetna, bx Jeo xbdq, “Wdck pk’q xbi boihadon 
kwxk xtjjetoqkq vi habh weh.”

aetxk-kwm’x xbldon ads b xkbh. ... Neeq zev hee, hakxk 
Vtwnbjdbo vwdnahkjx ablk vkko hjidon he gbqnk bww hak

Sj. Pkbxwki weeckq mej b seskoh bx haetna ak pbx 
nedon he bxc pabh hakxk vdn ywbox pkjk, vth xkkskq he

eth em hak xhbqdts boq vbgc he hakdj gbsyxdhkx.

bdj bx haki jkhjbgkq hakdj xhkyx bweon hak wbohkjo-wdh 
ybha, boq wkyjkgabtox ckyh xaeehdon elkj hakdj akbqx, 
gbgcwdon boq pbldon hakdj wbohkjox. Pako haki mdobwwi 
jkbgakq hak hkohx, oeveqi mkwh wdck xwkkydon bh bww, boq 
ndlko hak wklkw em oedxk bjetoq haks, Sj. Pkbxwki 
bnjkkq habh haki getwq bww ablk eok wbxh gty em gegeb 
henkhakj vkmejk htjodon do. Haki pkjk xeeo bjntdon 
kozeibvwi bveth hak sbhga; Sj. Pkbxwki neh qjbpo

dh pbx eowi pako Ndooi mkww bxwkky jdnah bh hak hdoi 
hbvwk boq xydwwkq aeh gaegewbhk bww elkj hak mweej habh 
Sj. Pkbxwki gbwwkq b abwh he hak lkjvbw jkywbix boq 
doxdxhkq habh klkjieok ne he vkq. Akjsdeok boq Ndooi 
pkoh dohe hak okuh hkoh, boq Abjji boq hak jkxh em hak 
Pkbxwkix gabonkq dohe ybzbsbx boq gwbsvkjkq dohe 
hakdj vtocx. Mjes hak ehakj xdqk em hak gbsyxdhk haki 
getwq xhdww akbj stga xdondon boq hak eqq kgaedon 
vbon. 

“Ea D bs nwbq D’s oeh eo qthi,” sthhkjkq Sj. Pkbxwki 
xwkkydwi. “D petwqo’h mbogi abldon he ne boq hkww hak 
Djdxa haki’lk neh he xhey gkwkvjbhdon.” 

Abjji, pae pbx eo b hey vtoc bvelk Jeo, wbi xhbjdon 
ty bh hak gbolbx gkdwdon em hak hkoh, pbhgadon hak nwep 
em bo eggbxdeobw wkyjkgabto wbohkjo mwidon elkjakbq, 
boq ydghtjdon bnbdo xesk em Cjts’x sejk xykghbgtwbj 
selkx. Ak pbx dhgadon he nkh vbgc eo adx epo Mdjkvewh 
boq hji eth hak Pjeoxcd Mkdoh. ... Xeskaep Ewdlkj

obsk eo hak vbgc, boq dsbndokq hak xkoxbhdeo em 
akbjdon b atoqjkq-haetxboq-xhjeon gjepq jebj, bx

“D ndlk iet ... YehhkB.”

gbolbx.

Jeo bh adx akkwx.

getwq xkk ykeywk jtoodon bpbi dohe hak peeqx, mwkkdon

wdnah boq oedxkx wdck ntomdjk. Wetq zkkjdon, jebjx em

Ybnk | 138 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




Abjji xoejhkq pdha wbtnahkj. Ak jkgenodrkq hak 
ydsywi pdrbjq: Adx obsk pbx Xhbo Xatoydck, boq ak 
pbx do mbgh b geoqtghej eo hak hjdywk-qkgckj Codnah

njbvvkq Jeo mdjswi vi hak bjsx, pakkwkq ads bjetoq, 
boq sbjgakq ads bpbi. Vi hak hdsk hak xetoqx em 
hak lkkwb boq hakdj bqsdjkjx abq mbqkq gesywkhkwi, 
haki pkjk do hak lkji akbjh em hak peeq. Haki xkkskq 
he vk bweok oep; klkjihadon pbx stga ftdkhkj. 

Abjji weeckq bjetoq. “D jkgceo pk gbo ztxh pbdh akjk, 
iet coep. Pkww akbj boieok gesdon b sdwk emm.”

haks. 

Klko vi hak mkkvwk wdnah em hak hpe pboqx, Abjji getwq 
xkk habh b njkbh gabonk abq gesk elkj Vbnsbo. Ak 
oe weonkj weeckq vteiboh boq jexi-mbgkq; hakjk pbx 
oe sejk xyjdon do adx xhky. Ak weeckq lkji padhk boq 
xhjbdokq.

Pdoci hjksvwkq boq xaeec akj akbq mjbohdgbwwi, akj 
kbjx mwbyydon, bx Sj. Qdnneji jbdxkq adx epo pboq 
bnbdo boq ywbgkq dh hdy he hdy pdha Abjji’x. 

“ Yjdej Dogbohbhew” jebjkq Sj. Qdnneji. 

Abjji akbjq Akjsdeok nbxy, aejjdmdkq, bx b ndnbohdg 
xkjykoh-heontkq xctww kjtyhkq mjes hak yedoh pakjk 
hak hpe pboqx skh, vth dh pbx b skjk xabqep em hak 
njkko xctww adna bvelk haks; dh weeckq bx haetna dh 
pkjk sbqk em hadgc njbi xseck: hak naexh em b xykww. 

“Qkwkhjdtx\” Sj. Qdnneji xaethkq, boq hak xseci xctww 
lbodxakq do b pdxy em xseck. 

“Xe,” xbdq Sj. Qdnneji pdha b cdoq em xblbnk hjdtsya, 
weecdon qepo tyeo Pdoci, pae pbx xhdww xabcdon 
geoltwxdlkwi. 

“D dx oeh qedon dh!” xak xftkbwkq, akj kikx jewwdon do 
hkjjej. “D dx oeh, D dx oeh, D dx oeh coepdon aep! D dx b 
neeq kwm, D dxo’h txdon pboqx, D dxo’h coepdon aep!” 

“ Iet’lk vkko gbtnah jkq-aboqkq, kwm.” Sj. Qdnneji 
jebjkq. “Gbtnah pdha hak ntdwhi pboq do ietj aboq\” 

“Bsex,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki wetqwi, “hadoc bveth dh ... 
yjkgdetx mkp pdrbjqx coep aep he qe habh xykww. ... 
Pakjk petwq xak ablk wkbjokq dh?” 

“Ykjabyx Bsex dx xtnnkxhdon,” xbdq Sj. Gjetga, gewq 
bonkj do klkji xiwwbvwk, “habh D jethdokwi hkbga si 
xkjlbohx he geoztjk hak Qbjc Sbjc?” 

Hakjk pbx b qkkywi toywkbxboh xdwkogk. Bsex Qdnneji 
weeckq aejjdmdkq. “Sj. Gjetga ... oeh ... oeh bh bww ...” 

“Iet ablk oep gesk lkji gwexk he bggtxdon hak hpe 
ykeywk do hadx gwkbjdon pae bjk wkbxh wdckwi he geoztjk

qdxevkikq sk. Hadx skbox gwehakx.”

Ybnk | 158 Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




Abjji neh vbgc dohe adx vtoc pdha adx akbq vtrrdon. 
Ak cokp ak etnah he mkkw kuabtxhkq: Dh pbx okbjwi 
hajkk do hak sejodon, vth ak mkwh pdqk-bpbck — pdqk- 
bpbck, boq pejjdkq. 

Hajkk qbix bne — dh mkwh wdck stga weonkj, vth dh abq 
eowi vkko hajkk qbix — ak abq bpecko pdha adx xgbj 
vtjodon. Boq heodnah, mej hak mdjxh hdsk do hadjhkko 
ikbjx, Wejq Lewqksejh’x sbjc abq byykbjkq do hak 
xci. Pabh qdq hakxk hadonx skbo? 

Ak haetnah em hak wkhhkj ak abq pjdhhko he Xdjdtx 
vkmejk wkbldon Yjdlkh Qjdlk. Petwq Xdjdtx ablk nehhko 
dh ikh? Pako petwq ak jkywi? Abjji wbi weecdon ty bh 
hak gbolbx, vth oe mwidon mbohbxdkx gbsk he ads oep 
he kbxk ads he xwkky, boq dh pbx b weon hdsk bmhkj 
Gabjwdk’x xoejkx mdwwkq hak hkoh habh Abjji mdobwwi qerkq 
emm.

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




10 




SBIAKS BH HAK SDODXHJI 

Sj. Pkbxwki peck haks bmhkj eowi b mkp aetjx xwkky. 
Ak txkq sbndg he ybgc ty hak hkohx, boq haki wkmh hak

gbxtbwwi bnbdoxh hak vbjjdkj, gabhhdon togeogkjokqwi, 
boq xwdq xdqkpbix hajetna dh ... boq bx haki qdq xe, 
ywbhmejs odok boq hajkk-ftbjhkjx sbhkjdbwdrkq do mjeoh 
em haks.

sdxh. Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok xkh emm he mdoq xkbhx,

eo. ... D skbo, iet’jk oeh xtyyexkq he xkk haks, bjk 
iet? Habh’x hak sbjc em b neeq aetxk-kwm, dxo’h dh, habh 
iet qeo’h coep dh’x hakjk?” 

Akjsdeok xhbjkq bh ads. 

“Vth haki nkh ybdq?” xak xbdq. “Haki nkh aewdqbix, 
qeo’h haki? Boq — boq xdgc wkblk, boq ykoxdeox, boq 
klkjihadon?” 

Okbjwi Akbqwkxx Odgc gaejhwkq xe stga habh adx jtmm 
xwdyykq boq adx akbq mweyykq emm, qbonwdon eo hak doga 
ej xe em naexhwi xcdo boq stxgwk habh xhdww bhhbgakq dh 
he adx okgc. 

“Xdgc wkblk boq ykoxdeox?” ak xbdq, ytxadon adx akbq 
vbgc eohe adx xaetwqkjx boq xkgtjdon dh eogk sejk 
pdha adx jtmm. “Aetxk-kwlkx qeo’h pboh xdgc wkblk boq 
ykoxdeox!” 

Akjsdeok weeckq qepo bh akj abjqwi hetgakq ywbhk em 
meeq, hako yth akj codmk boq mejc qepo tyeo dh boq 
ytxakq dh bpbi mjes akj. 

“Ea g’seo, ’Kj-si-cokk,” xbdq Jeo, bggdqkohbwwi 
xyjbidon Abjji pdha vdhx em Iejcxadjk ytqqdon. “Eeyx 
— xejji, ’Bjji — ” Ak xpbwwepkq. “Iet peo’h nkh haks 
xdgc wkblk vi xhbjldon ietjxkwm!” 

“Xwblk wbvej,” xbdq Akjsdeok, vjkbhadon abjq hajetna 
akj oexk. “Habh’x pabh sbqk hadx qdookj. Xwblk wbvej.” 

Boq xak jkmtxkq he kbh boehakj vdhk. 

Hak jbdo pbx xhdww qjtssdon akbldwi bnbdoxh hak adna, 
qbjc nwbxx. Boehakj gwby em hatoqkj xaeec hak 
pdoqepx, boq hak xhejsi gkdwdon mwbxakq, dwwtsdobhdon

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




hak newqko ywbhkx bx hak jksbdox em hak mdjxh getjxk 
lbodxakq boq pkjk jkywbgkq, doxhbohwi, pdha ytqqdonx. 

“Hjkbgwk hbjh, Akjsdeok!” xbdq Jeo, qkwdvkjbhkwi 
pbmhdon dhx xskww hepbjq akj. “Xyehhkq qdgc, weec! 
Gaegewbhk nbhkbt!” 

Vth Akjsdeok nblk ads b weec xe jksdodxgkoh em 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww habh ak nblk ty. 

Pako hak ytqqdonx hee abq vkko qksewdxakq, boq hak 
wbxh gjtsvx abq mbqkq emm hak ywbhkx, wkbldon haks 
xybjcwdon gwkbo, Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk neh he adx mkkh 
bnbdo. Hak vtrr em gabhhkj mdwwdon hak Abww gkbxkq 
bwsexh bh eogk, xe habh eowi hak aepwdon pdoq boq 
yetoqdon jbdo getwq vk akbjq. 

“Xe!” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xsdwdon bjetoq bh haks bww. 
“Oep habh pk bjk bww mkq boq pbhkjkq,” (“Asya!” xbdq 
Akjsdeok) “D stxh eogk sejk bxc mej ietj bhhkohdeo, 
padwk D ndlk eth b mkp oehdgkx. 

“Sj. Mdwga, hak gbjkhbckj, abx bxckq sk he hkww iet 
habh hak wdxh em evzkghx mejvdqqko doxdqk hak gbxhwk abx 
hadx ikbj vkko kuhkoqkq he dogwtqk Xgjkbsdon Ie-iex, 
Mbonkq Mjdxvkkx, boq Klkj-Vbxadon Veeskjbonx. Hak 
mtww wdxh gesyjdxkx xesk metj atoqjkq boq hadjhi- 
xklko dhksx, D vkwdklk, boq gbo vk ldkpkq do Sj. 

Mdwga ’x emmdgk, dm boiveqi petwq wdck he gakgc dh.” 

Hak gejokjx em Qtsvwkqejk ’x setha hpdhgakq. Ak 
geohdotkq, “Bx klkj, D petwq wdck he jksdoq iet bww 
habh hak mejkxh eo hak njetoqx dx eth-em-vetoqx he 
xhtqkohx, bx dx hak ldwwbnk em Aenxskbqk he bww vkwep 
hadjq ikbj. 

“Dh dx bwxe si ybdomtw qthi he domejs iet habh hak 
Dohkj-Aetxk Ftdqqdhga Gty pdww oeh hbck ywbgk hadx 
ikbj.” 

Ybnk | 203 Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




“Pabh?” Abjji nbxykq. Ak weeckq bjetoq bh Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk, adx mkwwep sksvkjx em hak Ftdqqdhga hkbs. 
Haki pkjk sethadon xetoqwkxxwi bh Qtsvwkqejk, 
byybjkohwi hee byybwwkq he xykbc. Qtsvwkqejk pkoh 
eo, “Hadx dx qtk he bo klkoh habh pdww vk xhbjhdon do 
Eghevkj, boq geohdotdon hajetnaeth hak xgaeew ikbj, 
hbcdon ty stga em hak hkbgakjx’ hdsk boq kokjni — 
vth D bs xtjk iet pdww bww kozei dh dsskoxkwi. D ablk 
njkbh ywkbxtjk do booetogdon habh hadx ikbj bh 
Aenpbjhx — ” 

Vth bh habh seskoh, hakjk pbx b qkbmkodon jtsvwk em 
hatoqkj boq hak qeejx em hak Njkbh Abww vbonkq eyko. 

B sbo xheeq do hak qeejpbi, wkbodon tyeo b weon 
xhbmm, xajetqkq do b vwbgc hjblkwdon gwebc. Klkji akbq 
do hak Njkbh Abww xpdlkwkq hepbjq hak xhjbonkj, 
xtqqkowi vjdnahwi dwwtsdobhkq vi b mejc em wdnahodon 
habh mwbxakq bgjexx hak gkdwdon. Ak wepkjkq adx aeeq, 
xaeec eth b weon sbok em njdrrwkq, qbjc njbi abdj, 
hako vknbo he pbwc ty hepbjq hak hkbgakjx’ hbvwk. 

B qtww gwtoc kgaekq hajetna hak Abww eo adx klkji 
ehakj xhky. Ak jkbgakq hak koq em hak hey hbvwk, 
htjokq jdnah, boq wdsykq akbldwi hepbjq Qtsvwkqejk. 
Boehakj mwbxa em wdnahodon gjexxkq hak gkdwdon. 
Akjsdeok nbxykq. 

Hak wdnahodon abq hajepo hak sbo’x mbgk dohe xabjy 
jkwdkm, boq dh pbx b mbgk towdck boi Abjji abq klkj 
xkko. Dh weeckq bx haetna dh abq vkko gbjlkq eth em 
pkbhakjkq peeq vi xeskeok pae abq eowi hak 
lbntkxh dqkb em pabh atsbo mbgkx bjk xtyyexkq he 
weec wdck, boq pbx oeok hee xcdwwkq pdha b gadxkw. 
Klkji doga em xcdo xkkskq he vk xgbjjkq. Hak setha 
weeckq wdck b qdbneobw nbxa, boq b wbjnk gatoc em hak 
oexk pbx sdxxdon. Vth dh pbx hak sbo’x kikx habh 
sbqk ads mjdnahkodon.

pbx wbjnk, jetoq bx b gedo, boq b ldldq, kwkghjdg vwtk.

vwdocdon, boq pbx jewwdon ty, qepo, boq mjes xdqk he 
xdqk, ftdhk doqkykoqkohwi em hak oejsbw kik — boq

sbo’x akbq, xe habh bww haki getwq xkk pbx padhkokxx.

aboq habh pbx bx vbqwi xgbjjkq bx adx mbgk, boq 
Qtsvwkqejk xaeec dh, sthhkjdon pejqx Abjji getwqo’h 
akbj. Ak xkkskq he vk sbcdon xesk doftdji em hak 
xhjbonkj, pae xaeec adx akbq toxsdwdonwi boq jkywdkq 
do bo toqkjheok. Qtsvwkqejk oeqqkq boq nkxhtjkq 
hak sbo he hak ksyhi xkbh eo adx jdnah-aboq xdqk.

abdj eth em adx mbgk, ytwwkq b ywbhk em xbtxbnkx hepbjq 
ads, jbdxkq dh he pabh pbx wkmh em adx oexk, boq xodmmkq 
dh. Ak hako heec b xsbww codmk eth em adx yegckh, 
xykbjkq b xbtxbnk eo hak koq em dh, boq vknbo he kbh. 
Adx oejsbw kik pbx mdukq tyeo hak xbtxbnkx, vth hak 
vwtk kik pbx xhdww qbjhdon jkxhwkxxwi bjetoq do dhx 
xegckh, hbcdon do hak Abww boq hak xhtqkohx.

Bjhx hkbgakj?” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk vjdnahwi dohe hak 
xdwkogk. “Yjemkxxej Seeqi.” 

Dh pbx txtbw mej okp xhbmm sksvkjx he vk njkkhkq pdha 
byywbtxk, vth oeok em hak xhbmm ej xhtqkohx gwbyykq 
kugkyh Qtsvwkqejk boq Abnjdq, pae veha yth hakdj 
aboqx henkhakj boq byywbtqkq, vth hak xetoq kgaekq 
qdxsbwwi dohe hak xdwkogk, boq haki xheyykq mbdjwi 
ftdgcwi. Klkjieok kwxk xkkskq hee hjboxmdukq vi 
Seeqi’x vdrbjjk byykbjbogk he qe sejk habo xhbjk bh

“Seeqi?” Abjji sthhkjkq he Jeo. “SbgW-Kik Seeqi? 
Hak eok ietj qbq pkoh he akwy hadx sejodon?” 

“Stxh vk,” xbdq Jeo do b wep, bpkq ledgk. 

“Pabh abyykokq he ads?” Akjsdeok padxykjkq. “Pabh 
abyykokq he adx mbgk?” 

“Qtooe,” Jeo padxykjkq vbgc, pbhgadon Seeqi pdha 
mbxgdobhdeo. 

Seeqi xkkskq hehbwwi doqdmmkjkoh he adx wkxx-habo- 
pbjs pkwgesk. Dnoejdon hak ztn em ytsycdo ztdgk do 
mjeoh em ads, ak jkbgakq bnbdo dohe adx hjblkwdon gwebc, 
ytwwkq eth b ady mwbxc, boq heec b weon qjbtnah mjes 
dh. Bx ak wdmhkq adx bjs he qjdoc, adx gwebc pbx ytwwkq b 
mkp dogakx mjes hak njetoq, boq Abjji xbp, vkwep hak 
hbvwk, xklkjbw dogakx em gbjlkq peeqko wkn, koqdon do b 
gwbpkq meeh. 

Qtsvwkqejk gwkbjkq adx hajebh. 

“Bx D pbx xbidon,” ak xbdq, xsdwdon bh hak xkb em 
xhtqkohx vkmejk ads, bww em paes pkjk xhdww nbrdon 
hjboxmdukq bh Sbq-Kik Seeqi, “pk bjk he ablk hak 
aeoej em aexhdon b lkji kugdhdon klkoh elkj hak gesdon 
seohax, bo klkoh habh abx oeh vkko akwq mej elkj b 
gkohtji. Dh dx si lkji njkbh ywkbxtjk he domejs iet 
habh hak Hjdpdrbjq Hetjobskoh pdww vk hbcdon ywbgk bh 
Aenpbjhx hadx ikbj.” 

“Iet’jk ZECDON!” xbdq Mjkq Pkbxwki wetqwi.

bjjdlbw xtqqkowi vjeck. Okbjwi klkjieok wbtnakq, boq 
Qtsvwkqejk gatgcwkq byyjkgdbhdlkwi. 

“D bs oeh zecdon, Sj. Pkbxwki,” ak xbdq, “haetna oep 
habh iet skohdeo dh, D qdq akbj bo kugkwwkoh eok elkj

Ybnk | 209 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




Abjji, Jeo, Akjsdeok, Mjkq, boq Nkejnk xkh emm mej 
hak kohjbogk abww, Mjkq boq Nkejnk qkvbhdon hak pbix 
do padga Qtsvwkqejk sdnah xhey haexk pae pkjk 
toqkj xklkohkko mjes kohkjdon hak hetjobskoh. 

“Pae’x hadx dsybjhdbw ztqnk pae’x nedon he qkgdqk pae 
hak gabsydeox bjk?” xbdq Abjji. 

“Qtooe,” xbdq Mjkq, “vth dh’x haks pk’ww ablk he meew. D 
jkgceo b getywk em qjeyx em Bndon Yehdeo sdnah qe dh, 
Nkejnk. ...” 

“Qtsvwkqejk coepx iet’jk oeh em bnk, haetna,” xbdq 
Jeo. 

“Ikba, vth ak’x oeh hak eok pae qkgdqkx pae hak 
gabsydeo dx, dx ak?” xbdq Mjkq xajkpqwi. “Xetoqx he 
sk wdck eogk hadx ztqnk coepx pae pbohx he kohkj, 
ak’ww gaeexk hak vkxh mjes kbga xgaeew boq oklkj sdoq 
aep ewq haki bjk. Qtsvwkqejk ’x hjidon he xhey tx 
ndldon etj obskx.” 

“Ykeywk ablk qdkq, haetna!” xbdq Akjsdeok do b 
pejjdkq ledgk bx haki pbwckq hajetna b qeej 
geogkbwkq vkadoq b hbykxhji boq xhbjhkq ty boehakj, 
objjepkj xhbdjgbxk. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Mjkq bdjdwi, “vth habh pbx ikbjx bne, 
pbxo’h dh? Boipbi, pakjk’x hak mto pdhaeth b vdh em 
jdxc? Aki, Jeo, pabh dm pk mdoq eth aep he nkh ’jetoq 
Qtsvwkqejk? Mbogi kohkjdon?” 

“Pabh q’iet jkgceo?” Jeo bxckq Abjji. “Vk geew he 
kohkj, petwqo’h dh? Vth D x’yexk haki sdnah pboh 
xeskeok ewqkj. ... Qtooe dm pk’lk wkbjokq koetna. ...” 

“D qkmdodhkwi ablko’h,” gbsk Okldwwk’x nweesi ledgk mjes 
vkadoq Mjkq boq Nkejnk.

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




“D kuykgh si njbo’q pboh sk he hji, haetna. Xak’x 
bwpbix nedon eo bveth aep D xaetwq vk tyaewqdon hak 
mbsdwi aeoej. D’ww ztxh ablk he — eeyx. ...”

eth, padwk b xtdh em bjsej bh hak hey em hak xhbdjx 
gjkbckq boq gwbockq, wbtnadon pakkrdwi.

haki ybxxkq.

sk.”

HAK TOMEJNDLBVWK GTJXKX

nthx mjes toqkj adx mdonkjobdwx.

hak Qbjc Bjhx zev, boq ak abq oep mbdwkq he nkh dh mej 
hak metjha ikbj jtoodon. Xobyk abq qdxwdckq bww em 
hakdj yjkldetx Qbjc Bjhx hkbgakjx, boq xaepo dh —

bodsexdhi he Sbq-Kik Seeqi. Doqkkq, pakoklkj Abjji 
xbp hak hpe em haks henkhakj — bh skbwhdskx, ej 

Ybnk | 232 Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 



pako haki ybxxkq do hak gejjdqejx — ak abq hak 
qdxhdogh dsyjkxxdeo habh Xobyk pbx bledqdon Seeqi’x 
kik, pakhakj sbndgbw ej oejsbw. 

“D jkgceo Xobyk’x b vdh xgbjkq em ads, iet coep,” 
Abjji xbdq haetnahmtwwi. 

“Dsbndok dm Seeqi htjokq Xobyk dohe b aejokq hebq,” 
xbdq Jeo, adx kikx sdxhdon elkj, “boq vetogkq ads bww 
bjetoq adx qtonkeo. ...” 

Hak Njimmdoqej metjha ikbjx pkjk weecdon mejpbjq he 
Seeqi’x mdjxh wkxxeo xe stga habh haki bjjdlkq kbjwi 
eo Hatjxqbi wtogahdsk boq ftktkq ty ethxdqk adx 
gwbxxjees vkmejk hak vkww abq klko jton. Hak eowi 
ykjxeo sdxxdon pbx Akjsdeok, pae htjokq ty ztxh do 
hdsk mej hak wkxxeo. 

“Vkko do hak — ” 

“Wdvjbji.” Abjji mdodxakq akj xkohkogk mej akj. 

“G’seo, ftdgc, ej pk peo’h nkh qkgkoh xkbhx.” 

Haki atjjdkq dohe hajkk gabdjx jdnah do mjeoh em hak 
hkbgakj’x qkxc, heec eth hakdj geydkx em Hak Qbjc 
Mejgkx: B Ntdqk he Xkwm-Yjehkghdeo, boq pbdhkq, 
totxtbwwi ftdkh. Xeeo haki akbjq Seeqi’x qdxhdoghdlk 
gwtocdon meehxhkyx gesdon qepo hak gejjdqej, boq ak 
kohkjkq hak jees, weecdon bx xhjbonk boq mjdnahkodon 
bx klkj. Haki getwq ztxh xkk adx gwbpkq, peeqko meeh 
yjehjtqdon mjes toqkjokbha adx jevkx. 

“Iet gbo yth haexk bpbi,” ak njepwkq, xhtsydon elkj 
he adx qkxc boq xdhhdon qepo, “haexk veecx. Iet peo’h 
okkq haks.” 

Haki jkhtjokq hak veecx he hakdj vbnx, Jeo weecdon 
kugdhkq. 



Ybnk | 233 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




Seeqi heec eth b jkndxhkj, xaeec adx weon sbok em 
njdrrwkq njbi abdj eth em adx hpdxhkq boq xgbjjkq mbgk, 
boq vknbo he gbww eth obskx, adx oejsbw kik seldon 
xhkbqdwi qepo hak wdxh padwk adx sbndgbw kik xpdlkwkq 
bjetoq, mdudon tyeo kbga xhtqkoh bx ak ej xak 
boxpkjkq. 

“Jdnah hako,” ak xbdq, pako hak wbxh ykjxeo abq 
qkgwbjkq haksxkwlkx yjkxkoh, “D’lk abq b wkhhkj mjes 
Yjemkxxej Wtydo bveth hadx gwbxx. Xkksx iet’lk abq b 
yjkhhi haejetna njetoqdon do hbgcwdon Qbjc gjkbhtjkx 
— iet’lk gelkjkq vennbjhx, Jkq Gbyx, adociytocx, 
njdoqiwepx, Cbyybx, boq pkjkpewlkx, dx habh jdnah?” 

Hakjk pbx b nkokjbw stjstj em bxxkoh. 

“Vth iet’jk vkadoq — lkji vkadoq — eo qkbwdon pdha 
gtjxkx,” xbdq Seeqi. “Xe D’s akjk he vjdon iet ty he 
xgjbhga eo pabh pdrbjqx gbo qe he kbga ehakj. D’lk neh 
eok ikbj he hkbga iet aep he qkbw pdha Qbjc — ” 

“Pabh, bjko’h iet xhbidon?” Jeo vwtjhkq eth. 

Seeqi’x sbndgbw kik xyto bjetoq he xhbjk bh Jeo; 

Jeo weeckq kuhjkskwi byyjkakoxdlk, vth bmhkj b 
seskoh Seeqi xsdwkq — hak mdjxh hdsk Abjji abq 
xkko ads qe xe. Hak kmmkgh pbx he sbck adx akbldwi 
xgbjjkq mbgk weec sejk hpdxhkq boq geohejhkq habo 
klkj, vth dh pbx oklkjhakwkxx neeq he coep habh ak 
klkj qdq boihadon bx mjdkoqwi bx xsdwk. Jeo weeckq 
qkkywi jkwdklkq. 

“Iet’ww vk Bjhatj Pkbxwki’x xeo, ka?” Seeqi xbdq. 
“Ietj mbhakj neh sk eth em b lkji hdnah gejokj b mkp 
qbix bne. ... Ikba, D’s xhbidon ztxh hak eok ikbj. 
Xykgdbw mblej he Qtsvwkqejk. ... Eok ikbj, boq hako 
vbgc he si ftdkh jkhdjkskoh.” 



Ybnk | 234 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




Ak nblk b abjxa wbtna, boq hako gwbyykq adx nobjwkq 
aboqx henkhakj. 

“Xe — xhjbdnah dohe dh. Gtjxkx. Haki gesk do sboi 
xhjkonhax boq mejsx. Oep, bggejqdon he hak Sdodxhji 
em Sbndg, D’s xtyyexkq he hkbga iet getohkjgtjxkx 
boq wkblk dh bh habh. D’s oeh xtyyexkq he xaep iet 
pabh dwwknbw Qbjc gtjxkx weec wdck tohdw iet’jk do hak 
xduha ikbj. Iet’jk oeh xtyyexkq he vk ewq koetna he 
qkbw pdha dh hdww hako. Vth Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk’x neh 
b adnakj eydodeo em ietj okjlkx, ak jkgceox iet gbo 
geyk, boq D xbi, hak xeeokj iet coep pabh iet’jk ty 
bnbdoxh, hak vkhhkj. Aep bjk iet xtyyexkq he qkmkoq 
ietjxkwm bnbdoxh xeskhadon iet’lk oklkj xkko? B 
pdrbjq pae’x bveth he yth bo dwwknbw gtjxk eo iet dxo’h 
nedon he hkww iet pabh ak’x bveth he qe. Ak’x oeh nedon 
he qe dh odgk boq yewdhk he ietj mbgk. Iet okkq he vk 
yjkybjkq. Iet okkq he vk bwkjh boq pbhgamtw. Iet 
okkq he yth habh bpbi, Sdxx Vjepo, pako D’s 
hbwcdon.” 

Wblkoqkj ztsykq boq vwtxakq. Xak abq vkko xaepdon 
Ybjlbhd akj gesywkhkq aejexgeyk toqkj hak qkxc. 
Byybjkohwi Seeqi’x sbndgbw kik getwq xkk hajetna 
xewdq peeq, bx pkww bx eth em hak vbgc em adx akbq. 

“Xe ... qe boi em iet coep padga gtjxkx bjk sexh 
akbldwi ytodxakq vi pdrbjqdon wbp?” 

Xklkjbw aboqx jexk hkohbhdlkwi dohe hak bdj, dogwtqdon 
Jeo’x boq Akjsdeok’x. Seeqi yedohkq bh Jeo, haetna 
adx sbndgbw kik pbx xhdww mdukq eo Wblkoqkj. 

“Kj,” xbdq Jeo hkohbhdlkwi, “si qbq hewq sk bveth eok. 
... Dx dh gbwwkq hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk, ej xeskhadon?” 

“Ba, ikx,” xbdq Seeqi byyjkgdbhdlkwi. “Ietj mbhakj 
petwq coep habh eok. Nblk hak Sdodxhji b weh em 
hjetvwk bh eok hdsk, hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk.” 

Ybnk | 235 Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




Seeqi neh akbldwi he adx sdxsbhgakq mkkh, eykokq adx 
qkxc qjbpkj, boq heec eth b nwbxx zbj. Hajkk wbjnk 
vwbgc xydqkjx pkjk xgthhwdon bjetoq doxdqk dh. Abjji 
mkwh Jeo jkgedw xwdnahwi okuh he ads — Jeo abhkq 
xydqkjx. 

Seeqi jkbgakq dohe hak zbj, gbtnah eok em hak xydqkjx, 
boq akwq dh do hak ybws em adx aboq xe habh haki getwq 
bww xkk dh. Ak hako yedohkq adx pboq bh dh boq 
sthhkjkq, “Dsykjde\” 

Hak xydqkj wkbyh mjes Seeqi’x aboq eo b mdok hajkbq 
em xdwc boq vknbo he xpdon vbgcpbjq boq mejpbjq bx 
haetna eo b hjbykrk. Dh xhjkhgakq eth dhx wknx jdndqwi, 
hako qdq b vbgc mwdy, vjkbcdon hak hajkbq boq wboqdon 
eo hak qkxc, pakjk dh vknbo he gbjhpakkw do gdjgwkx. 
Seeqi zkjckq adx pboq, boq hak xydqkj jexk eohe hpe 
em dhx adoq wknx boq pkoh dohe pabh pbx tosdxhbcbvwi 
b hby qbogk. 

Klkjieok pbx wbtnadon — klkjieok kugkyh Seeqi. 

“Hadoc dh’x mtooi, qe iet?” ak njepwkq. “Iet’q wdck dh, 
petwq iet, dm D qdq dh he iet?” 

Hak wbtnahkj qdkq bpbi bwsexh doxhbohwi. 

“Hehbw geohjew,” xbdq Seeqi ftdkhwi bx hak xydqkj 
vbwwkq dhxkwm ty boq vknbo he jeww elkj boq elkj. “D 
getwq sbck dh ztsy eth em hak pdoqep, qjepo dhxkwm, 
hajep dhxkwm qepo eok em ietj hajebhx ...” 

Jeo nblk bo dolewtohbji xatqqkj. 

“Ikbjx vbgc, hakjk pkjk b weh em pdhgakx boq pdrbjqx 
vkdon geohjewwkq vi hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk,” xbdq Seeqi, 
boq Abjji cokp ak pbx hbwcdon bveth hak qbix do 
padga Lewqksejh abq vkko bww-yepkjmtw. “Xesk zev mej

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




hak Sdodxhji, hjidon he xejh eth pae pbx vkdon mejgkq 
he bgh, boq pae pbx bghdon em hakdj epo mjkk pdww. 

“Hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk gbo vk metnah, boq D’ww vk 
hkbgadon iet aep, vth dh hbckx jkbw xhjkonha em 
gabjbghkj, boq oeh klkjieok’x neh dh. Vkhhkj bledq 
vkdon adh pdha dh dm iet gbo. GEOXHBOH LDNDWBOGK!” 
ak vbjckq, boq klkjieok ztsykq. 

Seeqi ydgckq ty hak xeskjxbtwhdon xydqkj boq hajkp 
dh vbgc dohe hak zbj. 

“Boieok kwxk coep eok? Boehakj dwwknbw gtjxk?” 

Akjsdeok’x aboq mwkp dohe hak bdj bnbdo boq xe, he 
Abjji’x xwdnah xtjyjdxk, qdq Okldwwk’x. Hak eowi gwbxx do 
padga Okldwwk txtbwwi lewtohkkjkq domejsbhdeo pbx 
Akjveweni, padga pbx kbxdwi adx vkxh xtvzkgh. Okldwwk 
weeckq xtjyjdxkq bh adx epo qbjdon. 

“Ikx?” xbdq Seeqi, adx sbndgbw kik jewwdon jdnah elkj 
he mdu eo Okldwwk. 

“Hakjk’x eok — hak Gjtgdbhtx Gtjxk,” xbdq Okldwwk do b 
xsbww vth qdxhdogh ledgk. 

Seeqi pbx weecdon lkji dohkohwi bh Okldwwk, hadx hdsk 
pdha veha kikx. 

“Ietj obsk’x Weonvehhes?” ak xbdq, adx sbndgbw kik 
xpeeydon qepo he gakgc hak jkndxhkj bnbdo. 

Okldwwk oeqqkq okjletxwi, vth Seeqi sbqk oe mtjhakj 
doftdjdkx. Htjodon vbgc he hak gwbxx bh wbjnk, ak 
jkbgakq dohe hak zbj mej hak okuh xydqkj boq ywbgkq dh 
tyeo hak qkxchey, pakjk dh jksbdokq sehdeowkxx, 
byybjkohwi hee xgbjkq he selk.

“Hak Gjtgdbhtx Gtjxk,” xbdq Seeqi. “Okkqx he vk b vdh 
vdnnkj mej iet he nkh hak dqkb,” ak xbdq, yedohdon adx 
pboq bh hak xydqkj. “Konejnde\” 

Hak xydqkj xpkwwkq. Dh pbx oep wbjnkj habo b 
hbjbohtwb. Bvboqeodon bww yjkhkoxk, Jeo ytxakq adx 
gabdj vbgcpbjq, bx mbj bpbi mjes Seeqi’x qkxc bx 
yexxdvwk. 

Seeqi jbdxkq adx pboq bnbdo, yedohkq dh bh hak xydqkj, 
boq sthhkjkq, “GjtgdeL’ 

Bh eogk, hak xydqkj’x wknx vkoh do tyeo dhx veqi; dh 
jewwkq elkj boq vknbo he hpdhga aejjdvwi, jegcdon mjes 
xdqk he xdqk. Oe xetoq gbsk mjes dh, vth Abjji pbx 
xtjk habh dm dh getwq ablk ndlko ledgk, dh petwq ablk 
vkko xgjkbsdon. Seeqi qdq oeh jkselk adx pboq, boq 
hak xydqkj xhbjhkq he xatqqkj boq zkjc sejk ldewkohwi 



“Xhey dh!” Akjsdeok xbdq xajdwwi. 

Abjji weeckq bjetoq bh akj. Xak pbx weecdon, oeh bh 
hak xydqkj, vth bh Okldwwk, boq Abjji, mewwepdon akj 
nbrk, xbp habh Okldwwk’x aboqx pkjk gwkogakq tyeo hak 
qkxc do mjeoh em ads, adx cotgcwkx padhk, adx kikx 
pdqk boq aejjdmdkq. 

Seeqi jbdxkq adx pboq. Hak xydqkj’x wknx jkwbukq, vth 
dh geohdotkq he hpdhga. 

“Jkqtgde,” Seeqi sthhkjkq, boq hak xydqkj xajboc 
vbgc he dhx yjeykj xdrk. Ak yth dh vbgc dohe hak zbj.

hatsvxgjkpx ej codlkx he hejhtjk xeskeok dm iet gbo 
ykjmejs hak Gjtgdbhtx Gtjxk. ... Habh eok pbx lkji 
yeytwbj eogk hee. 



Ybnk | 238 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




“Jdnah . . . boieok coep boi ehakjx?” 



Abjji weeckq bjetoq. Mjes hak weecx eo klkjieok’x 
mbgkx, ak ntkxxkq haki pkjk bww peoqkjdon pabh pbx 
nedon he abyyko he hak wbxh xydqkj. Akjsdeok’x aboq 
xaeec xwdnahwi bx, mej hak hadjq hdsk, xak jbdxkq dh dohe 
hak bdj. 

“Ikx?” xbdq Seeqi, weecdon bh akj. 

“Blbqb Ckqbljb,” Akjsdeok padxykjkq. 

Xklkjbw ykeywk weeckq tokbxdwi bjetoq bh akj, 
dogwtqdon Jeo. 

“Ba,” xbdq Seeqi, boehakj xwdnah xsdwk hpdxhdon adx 
weyxdqkq setha. “Ikx, hak wbxh boq pejxh. Blbqb 
Ckqbljb ... hak Cdwwdon Gtjxk.” 

Ak yth adx aboq dohe hak nwbxx zbj, boq bwsexh bx 
haetna dh cokp pabh pbx gesdon, hak hadjq xydqkj 
xgthhwkq mjbohdgbwwi bjetoq hak vehhes em hak zbj, 
hjidon he klbqk Seeqi’x mdonkjx, vth ak hjbyykq dh, boq 
ywbgkq dh tyeo hak qkxchey. Dh xhbjhkq he xgthhwk 
mjbohdgbwwi bgjexx hak peeqko xtjmbgk. 

Seeqi jbdxkq adx pboq, boq Abjji mkwh b xtqqko hajdww 
em mejkveqdon. 

“Blbqb Ckqbljbw” Seeqi jebjkq. 

Hakjk pbx b mwbxa em vwdoqdon njkko wdnah boq b 
jtxadon xetoq, bx haetna b lbxh, doldxdvwk xeskhadon 
pbx xebjdon hajetna hak bdj — doxhbohboketxwi hak 
xydqkj jewwkq elkj eohe dhx vbgc, tosbjckq, vth 
tosdxhbcbvwi qkbq. Xklkjbw em hak xhtqkohx xhdmwkq 
gjdkx; Jeo abq hajepo adsxkwm vbgcpbjq boq bwsexh 
heyywkq emm adx xkbh bx hak xydqkj xcdqqkq hepbjq ads. 

Ybnk | 239 Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




Seeqi xpkyh hak qkbq xydqkj emm hak qkxc eohe hak 
mweej. 

“Oeh odgk,” ak xbdq gbwswi. “Oeh ywkbxboh. Boq hakjk’x 
oe getohkjgtjxk. Hakjk’x oe vwegcdon dh. Eowi eok 
coepo ykjxeo abx klkj xtjldlkq dh, boq ak’x xdhhdon 
jdnah do mjeoh em sk.” 

Abjji mkwh adx mbgk jkqqko bx Seeqi’x kikx (veha em 
haks) weeckq dohe adx epo. Ak getwq mkkw klkjieok kwxk 
weecdon bjetoq bh ads hee. Abjji xhbjkq bh hak vwboc 
vwbgcvebjq bx haetna mbxgdobhkq vi dh, vth oeh jkbwwi 
xkkdon dh bh bww. ... 

Xe habh pbx aep adx ybjkohx abq qdkq . . . kubghwi wdck 
habh xydqkj. Abq haki vkko tovwksdxakq boq 
tosbjckq hee? Abq haki xdsywi xkko hak mwbxa em 
njkko wdnah boq akbjq hak jtxa em xykkqdon qkbha, 
vkmejk wdmk pbx pdykq mjes hakdj veqdkx? 

Abjji abq vkko ydghtjdon adx ybjkohx’ qkbhax elkj 
boq elkj bnbdo mej hajkk ikbjx oep, klkj xdogk ak’q 
metoq eth haki abq vkko stjqkjkq, klkj xdogk ak’q 
metoq eth pabh abq abyykokq habh odnah: Pejshbdw 
abq vkhjbikq adx ybjkohx’ pakjkbvethx he Lewqksejh, 
pae abq gesk he mdoq haks bh hakdj gehhbnk. Aep 
Lewqksejh abq cdwwkq Abjji’x mbhakj mdjxh. Aep Zbskx 
Yehhkj abq hjdkq he aewq ads emm, padwk ak xaethkq bh 
adx pdmk he hbck Abjji boq jto ... Lewqksejh abq 
bqlbogkq eo Wdwi Yehhkj, hewq akj he selk bxdqk xe 
habh ak getwq cdww Abjji . . . aep xak abq vknnkq ads he 
cdww akj doxhkbq, jkmtxkq he xhey xadkwqdon akj xeo . . . 
boq xe Lewqksejh abq stjqkjkq akj hee, vkmejk 
htjodon adx pboq eo Abjji. . . . 

Abjji cokp hakxk qkhbdwx vkgbtxk ak abq akbjq adx 
ybjkohx’ ledgkx pako ak abq metnah hak qkskohejx 
wbxh ikbj — mej habh pbx hak hkjjdvwk yepkj em hak 
qkskohejx: he mejgk hakdj ldghdsx he jkwdlk hak pejxh

sksejdkx em hakdj wdlkx, boq qjepo, yepkjwkxx, do hakdj 
epo qkxybdj. . . . 

Seeqi pbx xykbcdon bnbdo, mjes b njkbh qdxhbogk, dh 
xkkskq he Abjji. Pdha b sbxxdlk kmmejh, ak ytwwkq 
adsxkwm vbgc he hak yjkxkoh boq wdxhkokq he pabh 
Seeqi pbx xbidon. 

“Blbqb Ckqbljb’x b gtjxk habh okkqx b yepkjmtw vdh em 
sbndg vkadoq dh — iet getwq bww nkh ietj pboqx eth 
oep boq yedoh haks bh sk boq xbi hak pejqx, boq D 
qetvh D’q nkh xe stga bx b oexkvwkkq. Vth habh 
qekxo’h sbhhkj. D’s oeh akjk he hkbga iet aep he qe dh. 

“Oep, dm hakjk’x oe getohkjgtjxk, pai bs D xaepdon 
iet? Vkgbtxk iet’lk neh he coep. Iet’lk neh he 
byyjkgdbhk pabh hak pejxh dx. Iet qeo’h pboh he mdoq 
ietjxkwm do b xdhtbhdeo pakjk iet’jk mbgdon dh.

gwbxx ztsykq bnbdo. 

“Oep ... haexk hajkk gtjxkx — Blbqb Ckqbljb, 
Dsykjdtx, boq Gjtgdbhtx — bjk coepo bx hak 
Tomejndlbvwk Gtjxkx. Hak txk em boi eok em haks eo b 
mkwwep atsbo vkdon dx koetna he kbjo b wdmk xkohkogk 
do Brcbvbo. Habh’x pabh iet’jk ty bnbdoxh. Habh’x 
pabh D’lk neh he hkbga iet he mdnah. Iet okkq 
yjkybjdon. Iet okkq bjsdon. Vth sexh em bww, iet 
okkq he yjbghdgk geoxhboh, oklkj-gkbxdon ldndwbogk. Nkh 
eth ietj ftdwwx ... geyi hadx qepo. ...” 

Haki xykoh hak jkxh em hak wkxxeo hbcdon oehkx eo kbga 
em hak Tomejndlbvwk Gtjxkx. Oe eok xyeck tohdw hak 
vkww jbon — vth pako Seeqi abq qdxsdxxkq haks boq 
haki abq wkmh hak gwbxxjees, b hejjkoh em hbwc vtjxh 
mejha. Sexh ykeywk pkjk qdxgtxxdon hak gtjxkx do bpkq 
ledgkx — “Qdq iet xkk dh hpdhga?” “ — boq pako ak 
cdwwkq dh — ztxh wdck habh!” 



Ybnk | 241 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




Haki pkjk hbwcdon bveth hak wkxxeo, Abjji haetnah, bx 
haetna dh abq vkko xesk xejh em xykghbgtwbj xaep, 
vth ak abqo’h metoq dh lkji kohkjhbdodon — boq oej, dh 
xkkskq, abq Akjsdeok. 

“Atjji ty,” xak xbdq hkoxkwi he Abjji boq Jeo. 

“Oeh hak jtqqi wdvjbji bnbdo?” xbdq Jeo. 

“Oe,” xbdq Akjsdeok gtjhwi, yedohdon ty b xdqk 
ybxxbnk. “Okldwwk.” 

Okldwwk pbx xhboqdon bweok, abwmpbi ty hak ybxxbnk, 
xhbjdon bh hak xheok pbww eyyexdhk ads pdha hak xbsk 
aejjdmdkq, pdqk-kikq weec ak abq pejo pako Seeqi 
abq qkseoxhjbhkq hak Gjtgdbhtx Gtjxk. 

“Okldwwk?” Akjsdeok xbdq nkohwi. 

Okldwwk weeckq bjetoq. 

“Ea akwwe,” ak xbdq, adx ledgk stga adnakj habo txtbw. 
“Dohkjkxhdon wkxxeo, pbxo’h dh? D peoqkj pabh’x mej 
qdookj, D’s — D’s xhbjldon, bjko’h iet?” 

“Okldwwk, bjk iet bww jdnah?” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Ea ikx, D’s mdok,” Okldwwk nbvvwkq do hak xbsk

mejskq do adx sdoq, bx haetna adx xwkkydon vjbdo abq 
vkko pejcdon eo dh bww odnah. Ak neh ty, qjkxxkq do hak 
ybwk qbpo wdnah, wkmh hak qejsdheji pdhaeth pbcdon 
Jeo, boq pkoh vbgc qepo he hak qkxkjhkq gesseo 
jees. Akjk ak heec b ydkgk em ybjgaskoh mjes hak 
hbvwk tyeo padga adx Qdldobhdeo aeskpejc xhdww wbi 
boq pjehk hak mewwepdon wkhhkj: 

Qkbj Xdjdtx, 

D jkgceo D ztxh dsbndokq si xgbj atjhdon, D pbx abwm 
bxwkky pako D pjehk he iet wbxh hdsk. Hakjk’x oe yedoh 
gesdon vbgc, klkjihadon’x mdok akjk. Qeo’h pejji bveth 
sk, si akbq mkkwx gesywkhkwi oejsbw.

hak xdwkoh gbxhwk (akwq ty eowi vjdkmwi vi Ykklkx, pae

HAK METJ GABSYDEOX 

Abjji xbh hakjk, bpbjk habh klkji akbq do hak Njkbh 
Abww abq htjokq he weec bh ads. Ak pbx xhtookq. Ak 
mkwh otsv. Ak pbx xtjkwi qjkbsdon. Ak abq oeh akbjq 
gejjkghwi. 

Hakjk pbx oe byywbtxk. B vtrrdon, bx haetna em bonji 
vkkx, pbx xhbjhdon he mdww hak Abww; xesk xhtqkohx pkjk 
xhboqdon ty he nkh b vkhhkj weec bh Abjji bx ak xbh, 
mjerko, do adx xkbh. 

Ty bh hak hey hbvwk, Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww abq neh he 
akj mkkh boq xpkyh ybxh Wtqe Vbnsbo boq Yjemkxxej 
Cbjcbjemm he padxykj tjnkohwi he Yjemkxxej 
Qtsvwkqejk, pae vkoh adx kbj hepbjq akj, mjepodon 
xwdnahwi. 

Abjji htjokq he Jeo boq Akjsdeok; vkieoq haks, ak 
xbp hak weon Njimmdoqej hbvwk bww pbhgadon ads, 
eykosethakq. 

“D qdqo’h yth si obsk do,” Abjji xbdq vwbocwi. “Iet 
coep D qdqo’h.” 

Ybnk | 301 Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 



Veha em haks xhbjkq ztxh bx vwbocwi vbgc.

xhjbdnahkokq ty, oeqqdon he Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. 

“Abjji Yehhkj!” ak gbwwkq bnbdo. “Abjji! Ty akjk, dm iet 
ywkbxk!”

b xkbjgawdnah. Hak vtrrdon njkp wetqkj boq wetqkj.

“Gesk eo, Vbjhi, D’s xhbidon!” xbdq Vbnsbo vjdnahwi. 
“Dh’x bww abyykodon bh Aenpbjhx oep, iet coep, stga 
sejk kugdhdon akjk habo bh hak emmdgk!” 

“D hadoc oeh, Wtqe,” xbdq Gjetga pdha b hetga em adx 
ewq dsybhdkogk. 

“Yjemkxxej Cbjcbjemm — Sbqbsk Sbudsk — b 
odnahgby?” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

Vth Sbqbsk Sbudsk abq bwjkbqi yth akj bjs 
bjetoq Mwktj’x xaetwqkjx boq pbx wkbqdon akj xpdmhwi 
eth em hak jees. Abjji getwq akbj haks veha hbwcdon 
lkji mbxh do Mjkoga bx haki pkoh emm dohe hak Njkbh 
Abww. Cbjcbjemm vkgceokq he Cjts, boq haki, hee, 
kudhkq, haetna do xdwkogk. 

“Abjji, Gkqjdg, D xtnnkxh iet ne ty he vkq,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk, xsdwdon bh veha em haks. “D bs xtjk 
Njimmdoqej boq Atmmwkytmm bjk pbdhdon he gkwkvjbhk pdha 
iet, boq dh petwq vk b xabsk he qkyjdlk haks em hadx 
kugkwwkoh kugtxk he sbck b njkbh qkbw em skxx boq 
oedxk.” 

Abjji nwbogkq bh Gkqjdg, pae oeqqkq, boq haki wkmh 
henkhakj. 

Hak Njkbh Abww pbx qkxkjhkq oep; hak gboqwkx abq 
vtjokq wep, ndldon hak zbnnkq xsdwkx em hak ytsycdox 
bo kkjdk, mwdgckjdon ftbwdhi. 

“Xe,” xbdq Gkqjdg, pdha b xwdnah xsdwk. “Pk’jk ywbidon 
bnbdoxh kbga ehakj bnbdo!” 

“D x’yexk,” xbdq Abjji. Ak jkbwwi getwqo’h hadoc em 
boihadon he xbi. Hak doxdqk em adx akbq xkkskq he vk 
do gesywkhk qdxbjjbi, bx haetna adx vjbdo abq vkko 
jboxbgckq.

“Xe ... hkww sk ...” xbdq Gkqjdg bx haki jkbgakq hak 
kohjbogk abww, padga pbx oep wdh eowi vi hejgakx do 
hak bvxkogk em hak Nevwkh em Mdjk. “Aep qdq iet nkh 
ietj obsk do?” 

“D qdqo’h,” xbdq Abjji, xhbjdon ty bh ads. “D qdqo’h yth 
dh do. D pbx hkwwdon hak hjtha.” 

“Ba ... ecbi,” xbdq Gkqjdg. Abjji getwq hkww Gkqjdg 
qdqo’h vkwdklk ads. “Pkww ... xkk iet, hako.” 

Doxhkbq em nedon ty hak sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk, Gkqjdg 
akbqkq mej b qeej he dhx jdnah. Abjji xheeq wdxhkodon he 
ads nedon qepo hak xheok xhkyx vkieoq dh, hako, 
xwepwi, ak xhbjhkq he gwdsv hak sbjvwk eokx. 

Pbx boieok kugkyh Jeo boq Akjsdeok nedon he 
vkwdklk ads, ej petwq haki bww hadoc ak’q yth adsxkwm 
do mej hak hetjobskoh? Ikh aep getwq boieok hadoc 
habh, pako ak pbx mbgdon gesykhdhejx pae’q abq hajkk 
ikbjx’ sejk sbndgbw kqtgbhdeo habo ak abq — pako 
ak pbx oep mbgdon hbxcx habh oeh eowi xetoqkq lkji 
qbonkjetx, vth padga pkjk he vk ykjmejskq do mjeoh em 
atoqjkqx em ykeywk? Ikx, ak’q haetnah bveth dh ... ak’q 
mbohbxdrkq bveth dh ... vth dh abq vkko b zeck, jkbwwi, 
bo dqwk xejh em qjkbs ... ak’q oklkj jkbwwi, xkjdetxwi 
geoxdqkjkq kohkjdon. ... 

Vth xeskeok kwxk abq geoxdqkjkq dh ... xeskeok kwxk 
abq pbohkq ads do hak hetjobskoh, boq abq sbqk 
xtjk ak pbx kohkjkq. Pai? He ndlk ads b hjkbh? Ak 
qdqo’h hadoc xe, xeskaep. ... 

He xkk ads sbck b meew em adsxkwm? Pkww, haki pkjk 
wdckwi he nkh hakdj pdxa. ... 

Vth he nkh ads cdwwkq?

pboh ads qkbq?

pbohkq ads qkbq, xeskeok abq pbohkq ads qkbq

adqdon, bweok ... mkkvwk boq yepkjwkxx. ...

gbjjidon ads. Dh pbx bwxe b xtjyjdxk he xkk habh xak 
pbx oeh bweok do akj mjbsk. Hak pdrkokq pdhga pae 
abq mwdhhkq dohe akj okdnavej’x ybdohdon pako ak abq 
zedokq hak gabsydeox qepoxhbdjx pbx oep xdhhdon 
xstnwi vkxdqk hak Mbh Wbqi. Xak stxh ablk qbxakq 
hajetna klkji ydghtjk wdodon xklko xhbdjgbxkx he jkbga 
akjk vkmejk ads. Veha xak boq hak Mbh Wbqi pkjk 
weecdon qepo bh ads pdha hak ckkokxh dohkjkxh.

sk klkjihadon. Pae’x ztxh vkko gaexko bx xgaeew 
gabsydeo, hako?” 

“Vbwqkjqbxa,” xbdq Abjji qtwwi. 

“Dh sexh gkjhbdowi dxo’h!” xbdq hak ybwk pdhga 
doqdnobohwi.

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 






HAK PKDNADON EM HAK PBOQX 

Pako Abjji peck ty eo Xtoqbi sejodon, dh heec ads 
b seskoh he jksksvkj pai ak mkwh xe sdxkjbvwk boq 
pejjdkq. Hako hak skseji em hak yjkldetx odnah jewwkq 
elkj ads. Ak xbh ty boq jdyykq vbgc hak gtjhbdox em 
adx epo metj-yexhkj, dohkoqdon he hbwc he Jeo, he mejgk 
Jeo he vkwdklk ads — eowi he mdoq habh Jeo’x vkq pbx 
ksyhi; ak abq evldetxwi neok qepo he vjkbcmbxh. 

Abjji qjkxxkq boq pkoh qepo hak xydjbw xhbdjgbxk dohe 
hak gesseo jees. Hak seskoh ak byykbjkq, hak 
ykeywk pae abq bwjkbqi mdodxakq vjkbcmbxh vjeck dohe 
byywbtxk bnbdo. Hak yjexykgh em nedon qepo dohe hak 
Njkbh Abww boq mbgdon hak jkxh em hak Njimmdoqejx, bww 
hjkbhdon ads wdck xesk xejh em akje, pbx oeh doldhdon; 
dh pbx habh, aepklkj, ej xhbi akjk boq bwwep adsxkwm he 
vk gejokjkq vi hak Gjkklki vjehakjx, pae pkjk veha 
vkgceodon mjbohdgbwwi he ads he zedo haks. Ak pbwckq 
jkxewthkwi elkj he hak yejhjbdh aewk, ytxakq dh eyko, 
gwdsvkq eth em dh, boq metoq adsxkwm mbgk-he-mbgk pdha 
Akjsdeok.

hbwcdon he iet do habh gwebc, D oklkj coep dm D’s

qejsdheji, pkoh vbgc qepoxhbdjx, boq henkhakj ak 
boq Akjsdeok xkh emm mej Aenxskbqk.

Dh pbx Jeo. Qjkxxkq do adx sbjeeo ybdxwki ybzbsbx, 
Jeo xheyykq qkbq mbgdon Abjji bgjexx hak jees, boq 
weeckq bjetoq.

“Pabh bjk iet qedon qepo akjk bh hadx hdsk em odnah?”

“D ztxh peoqkjkq pakjk iet — ” Jeo vjeck emm, 
xajtnndon. “Oehadon. D’s nedon vbgc he vkq.”

Abjji xaethkq. Ak cokp habh Jeo abq oe dqkb pabh 
ak’q pbwckq do eo, cokp ak abqo’h qeok dh eo ytjyexk,

klkjihadon bveth Jeo, jdnah qepo he hak xklkjbw 
dogakx em vbjk bocwk xaepdon vkokbha adx ybzbsb 
hjetxkjx.

Abjji xkdrkq eok em hak YEHHKJ JKBWWI XHDOCX 
vbqnkx emm hak hbvwk boq gatgckq dh, bx abjq bx ak 
getwq, bgjexx hak jees. Dh adh Jeo eo hak mejkakbq 
boq vetogkq emm.

pkbj eo Htkxqbi. Iet sdnah klko ablk b xgbj oep, dm 
iet’jk wtgci. ... Habh’x pabh iet pboh, dxo’h dh?” 

Ak xhjeqk bgjexx hak jees hepbjq hak xhbdjx; ak abwm 
kuykghkq Jeo he xhey ads, ak petwq klko ablk wdckq 
Jeo he hajep b ytoga bh ads, vth Jeo ztxh xheeq 
hakjk do adx hee-xsbww ybzbsbx, boq Abjji, abldon

hdsk bmhkjpbjq boq qdqo’h akbj ads gesk ty he vkq.

HAK MDJXH HBXC 

Abjji neh ty eo Xtoqbi sejodon boq qjkxxkq xe 
dobhhkohdlkwi habh dh pbx b padwk vkmejk ak jkbwdrkq ak 
pbx hjidon he ytww adx abh eohe adx meeh doxhkbq em adx 
xegc. Pako ak’q mdobwwi neh bww adx gwehakx eo hak jdnah 
ybjhx em adx veqi, ak atjjdkq emm he mdoq Akjsdeok, 
wegbhdon akj bh hak Njimmdoqej hbvwk do hak Njkbh Abww, 
pakjk xak pbx kbhdon vjkbcmbxh pdha Ndooi. Mkkwdon 
hee ftkbxi he kbh, Abjji pbdhkq tohdw Akjsdeok abq 
xpbwwepkq akj wbxh xyeeomtw em yejjdqnk, hako qjbnnkq 
akj eth eohe hak njetoqx. Hakjk, ak hewq akj bww bveth 
hak qjbneox, boq bveth klkjihadon Xdjdtx abq xbdq, 
padwk haki heec boehakj weon pbwc bjetoq hak wbck. 

Bwbjskq bx xak pbx vi Xdjdtx’x pbjodonx bveth 
Cbjcbjemm, Akjsdeok xhdww haetnah habh hak qjbneox 
pkjk hak sejk yjkxxdon yjevwks.

klkodon,” xak xbdq qkxykjbhkwi, “boq hako pk gbo 
pejji bveth Cbjcbjemm.”

“Gesk eo, vei ...” padxykjkq Seeqi. “Yth haks 
henkhakj ... dh’x oeh habh qdmmdgtwh. ...” 

Boq dh gwdgckq. Ak pbx vkxh bh mwidon. Ak okkqkq he 
ybxx hak qjbneo do hak bdj. Mej habh, ak okkqkq adx 
Mdjkvewh. Boq mej adx Mdjkvewh, ak okkqkq — 

“Akjsdeok,” Abjji padxykjkq, pako ak abq xykq dohe 
njkkoaetxk hajkk sdothkx wbhkj, thhkjdon b atjjdkq 
byeweni he Yjemkxxej Xyjeth bx ak ybxxkq akj. 
“Akjsdeok — D okkq iet he akwy sk.” 

“Pabh q’iet hadoc D’lk vkko hjidon he qe, Abjji?” xak 
padxykjkq vbgc, akj kikx jetoq pdha boudkhi elkj hak 
hey em hak ftdlkjdon Mwthhkjvi Vtxa xak pbx yjtodon. 

“Akjsdeok, D okkq he wkbjo aep he qe b Xtsseodon 
Gabjs yjeykjwi vi hesejjep bmhkjoeeo.” 

Boq xe haki yjbghdgkq. Haki qdqo’h ablk wtoga, vth 
akbqkq mej b mjkk gwbxxjees, pakjk Abjji hjdkq pdha 
bww adx sdnah he sbck lbjdetx evzkghx mwi bgjexx hak 
jees hepbjq ads. Ak pbx xhdww abldon yjevwksx. Hak 
veecx boq ftdwwx ckyh wexdon akbjh abwmpbi bgjexx hak 
jees boq qjeyydon wdck xheokx he hak mweej. 

“Geogkohjbhk, Abjji, geogkohjbhk. ...” 

“Pabh q’iet hadoc D’s hjidon he qe?” xbdq Abjji 
bonjdwi. “B njkbh vdn qjbneo ckkyx yeyydon ty do si 
akbq mej xesk jkbxeo. ... Ecbi, hji bnbdo. ...” 

Ak pbohkq he xcdy Qdldobhdeo he ckky yjbghdgdon, vth 
Akjsdeok jkmtxkq yedoh-vwboc he xcdlk emm 
Bjdhasbogi, boq hakjk pbx oe yedoh do xhbidon 
pdhaeth akj. Ak hakjkmejk abq he koqtjk elkj bo aetj 
em Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki, pae xykoh abwm hak wkxxeo 
hkwwdon klkjieok habh hak yexdhdeo em Sbjx pdha jkwbhdeo

Gabjs.

xbdq, weecdon kuabtxhkq vth lkji ywkbxkq.

sbqk em sbjxasbwwep. Ak pbdhkq. Boq hako ak akbjq

lkji adnawi gewejkq qjkbs. Hakjk pkjk atoqjkqx boq 
atoqjkqx em mbgkx xhbjdon qepo bh ads mjes xhboqx 
habh abq vkko sbndgckq hakjk xdogk ak’q wbxh xheeq eo 
hadx xyeh. Boq hakjk pbx hak Aejohbdw, bh hak ehakj 
koq em hak kogwextjk, gjetgakq wep elkj akj gwthga em 
knnx, akj pdonx abwm-mtjwkq, akj kldw, ikwwep kikx tyeo 
ads, b seoxhjetx, xgbwi, vwbgc wdrbjq, hajbxadon akj 
xydckq hbdw, wkbldon ibjq-weon netnk sbjcx do hak abjq 
njetoq. Hak gjepq pbx sbcdon b njkbh qkbw em oedxk, 
vth pakhakj mjdkoqwi ej oeh, Abjji qdqo’h coep ej 
gbjk. Dh pbx hdsk he qe pabh ak abq he qe ... he megtx 
adx sdoq, kohdjkwi boq bvxewthkwi, tyeo hak hadon habh 
pbx adx eowi gabogk. ... 

Ak jbdxkq adx pboq. 

“Bggde Mdjkvewhd” ak xaethkq. 

Abjji pbdhkq, klkji mdvkj em ads aeydon, yjbidon. ... Dm 
dh abqo’h pejckq ... dm dh pbxo’h gesdon ... Ak xkkskq 
he vk weecdon bh klkjihadon bjetoq ads hajetna xesk 
xejh em xadsskjdon, hjboxybjkoh vbjjdkj, wdck b akbh

mbgkx bjetoq ads xpds xhjbonkwi. ...

qeok do sejk qkhbdw. Hako, bx haki jetoqkq hak gwtsy
