qjbneox jebj, b pdhga wkbyh eth mjes vkadoq haks. 

Dh pbx Jdhb Xckkhkj. Xak pbx pkbjdon bgdq-njkko jevkx 
heqbi; hak Ftdgc-Ftehkx Ftdww do akj aboq vwkoqkq 
ykjmkghwi bnbdoxh haks. 

“Geonjbhtwbhdeox, Abjji!” xak xbdq, vkbsdon bh ads. “D 
peoqkj dm iet getwq ndlk sk b ftdgc pejq? Aep iet 
mkwh mbgdon habh qjbneo? Aep iet mkkw oep, bveth hak 
mbdjokxx em hak xgejdon?” 

“Ikba, iet gbo ablk b pejq,” xbdq Abjji xblbnkwi. 
“Neeq-vik.”

Cbjcbjemm. Haetna xaegckq bh mdjxh he akbj habh

ablk xtxykghkq dh bww bweon.

Cbjcbjemm? Oep pk coep pakjk haki cokp kbga ehakj. 
Haki pkjk yjevbvwi jtoodon bjetoq do sbxcx 
henkhakj bh hak Pejwq Gty. ... D’ww hkww iet eok hadon,

do hak nevwkh, ak’x nedon he vk mkkwdon jkbwwi xhtydq 
oep, dxo’h ak? Qdqo’h pejc, qdq dh? Iet eowi neh b 
xgjbhga! Gesk akjk — D’ww qe dh — ”

Ybnk | 409

“Xakww hpdxh klkjihadon ak xbix,” Abjji xbdq toqkj adx 
vjkbha.

em hadon Abnjdq sdnah qe.

Qtsvwkqejk’x oklkj xbgckq ads,” xbdq Jeo

he nkh jdq em hak xcjkphx. Xejji ... qdq D xbi pejxh? D 
skboh vkxh.”

sejk gakkjmtw, pkoh emm he wtoga.

tyaewqx hak mbsdwi’x aeoej, boq pk oklkj xykbcx dww em 
haks — haetna Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk hewq Qevvi ak 
qekx oeh doxdxh tyeo hadx. Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk xbdq 
pk dx mjkk he — he — ” 

Qevvi weeckq xtqqkowi okjletx boq vkgceokq Abjji 
gwexkj. Abjji vkoh mejpbjq. Qevvi padxykjkq, “Ak 
xbdq pk dx mjkk he gbww ads b — b vbjsi ewq geqnkj dm 
pk wdckx, xdj!” 

Qevvi nblk b mjdnahkokq xejh em ndnnwk. 

“Vth Qevvi dx oeh pbohdon he, Abjji Yehhkj,” ak xbdq, 
hbwcdon oejsbwwi bnbdo, boq xabcdon adx akbq xe habh 
adx kbjx mwbyykq. “Qevvi wdckx Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk 
lkji stga, xdj, boq dx yjetq he ckky adx xkgjkhx boq 
etj xdwkogk mej ads.” 

“Vth iet gbo xbi pabh iet wdck bveth hak Sbwmeix 
oep?” Abjji bxckq ads, njdoodon. 

B xwdnahwi mkbjmtw weec gbsk dohe Qevvi’x dsskoxk 
kikx. 

“Qevvi — Qevvi getwq,” ak xbdq qetvhmtwwi. Ak 
xftbjkq adx xsbww xaetwqkjx. “Qevvi getwq hkww Abjji 
Yehhkj habh adx ewq sbxhkjx pkjk — pkjk — vbq Qbjc 
pdrbjqx'.” 

Qevvi xheeq mej b seskoh, ftdlkjdon bww elkj, aejjej- 
xhjtgc vi adx epo qbjdon — hako ak jtxakq elkj he 
hak okbjkxh hbvwk boq vknbo vbondon adx akbq eo dh 
lkji abjq, xftkbwdon, “ Vbq Qevvi ! Vbq Qevvi\” 

Abjji xkdrkq Qevvi vi hak vbgc em adx hdk boq ytwwkq 
ads bpbi mjes hak hbvwk.

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




“Haboc iet, Abjji Yehhkj, haboc iet,” xbdq Qevvi 
vjkbhawkxxwi, jtvvdon adx akbq. 

“Iet ztxh okkq b vdh em yjbghdgk,” Abjji xbdq. 

“Yjbghdgk!” xftkbwkq Pdoci mtjdetxwi. “Iet dx etnah he 
vk bxabskq em ietjxkwm, Qevvi, hbwcdon habh pbi 
bveth ietj sbxhkjx!” 

“Haki dxo’h si sbxhkjx boisejk, Pdoci!” xbdq Qevvi 
qkmdbohwi. “Qevvi qekxo’h gbjk pabh haki hadoc 
boisejk!”

wkbcdon qepo akj mbgk eogk sejk. “Si yeej Sj. 
Gjetga, pabh dx ak qedon pdhaeth Pdoci? Ak dx 
okkqdon sk, ak dx okkqdon si akwy! D dx weecdon bmhkj 
hak Gjetgakx bww si wdmk, boq si sehakj dx qedon dh 
vkmejk sk, boq si njboqsehakj dx qedon dh vkmejk akj 
...ea pabh dx haki xbidon dm haki cokp Pdoci pbx 
mjkkq? Ea hak xabsk, hak xabsk!” Xak vtjdkq akj mbgk 
do akj xcdjh bnbdo boq vbpwkq. 

“Pdoci,” xbdq Akjsdeok mdjswi, “D’s ftdhk xtjk Sj. 
Gjetga dx nkhhdon bweon ykjmkghwi pkww pdhaeth iet. 
Pk’lk xkko ads, iet coep — ”

jbdxdon akj hkbjxhbdokq mbgk eth em akj xcdjh eogk sejk 
boq nennwdon bh Akjsdeok. “Iet dx xkkdon ads akjk bh 
Aenpbjhx?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “ak boq Sj. Vbnsbo bjk ztqnkx 
do hak Hjd-pdrbjq Hetjobskoh.”

Abjji’x njkbh xtjyjdxk (boq Jeo’x boq Akjsdeok’x hee, 
vi hak weecx eo hakdj mbgkx), xak weeckq bonji bnbdo.

Ybnk | 429

Akjsdeok’x pejqx bveth Cjts ckyh gesdon vbgc he 
ads. “Haki eowi wdck ads vkgbtxk ak’x mbsetx!” Abjji 
qetvhkq lkji stga dm boi em hak ndjwx pae abq bxckq 
he vk adx ybjhokj xe mbj petwq ablk pbohkq he ne he 
hak vbww pdha ads dm ak abqo’h vkko b xgaeew 
gabsydeo. Hako ak peoqkjkq dm hadx petwq vehakj 
ads dm Gae bxckq ads. 

Eo hak paewk, Abjji abq he bqsdh habh klko pdha hak 
ksvbjjbxxdon yjexykgh em eykodon hak vbww vkmejk ads, 
wdmk abq qkmdodhkwi dsyjelkq xdogk ak abq neh hajetna 
hak mdjxh hbxc. Ak pbxo’h bhhjbghdon okbjwi bx stga 
toywkbxbohokxx do hak gejjdqejx boisejk, padga ak 
xtxykghkq abq b weh he qe pdha Gkqjdg — ak abq bo 
dqkb Gkqjdg sdnah ablk hewq hak Atmmwkytmmx he wkblk 
Abjji bweok, do njbhdhtqk mej Abjji’x hdy-emm bveth hak 
qjbneox. Hakjk xkkskq he vk mkpkj Xtyyejh Gkqjdg 
Qdnnejiw vbqnkx bjetoq hee. Qjbge Sbwmei, em getjxk, 
pbx xhdww ftehdon Jdhb Xckkhkj’x bjhdgwk he ads bh klkji 
yexxdvwk eyyejhtodhi, vth ak pbx nkhhdon mkpkj boq 
mkpkj wbtnax eth em dh — boq ztxh he akdnahko Abjji’x 
mkkwdon em pkww-vkdon, oe xheji bveth Abnjdq abq 
byykbjkq do hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh 

“Xak qdqo’ xkks lkji doh’jkxhkq do sbndgbw gjkbhtjkx, 
hkj hkww ika hak hjtha,” Abnjdq xbdq, pako Abjji, Jeo, 
boq Akjsdeok bxckq ads aep adx dohkjldkp pdha Jdhb

adx kuyjkxxdeo sexh dww-obhtjkq. Xftkbwx dxxtkq mjes 
sboi em hak vtxakx, boq qbjc xabykx kskjnkq mjes 
haks.

bx b ndjw jbo ybxh ads. “Boq hko yedohx mjes Atmmwkytmm 
hee, Xhkvvdox!” bx b vei pkoh jtxadon bmhkj akj. “Boq 
pabh bjk iet hpe qedon?” ak bqqkq, gbhgadon xdnah em 
Abjji boq Jeo eo hak ybha bakbq. Cbjcbjemm, Abjji 
xbp, weeckq xwdnahwi qdxgesyexkq he xkk haks 
xhboqdon hakjk. Adx aboq pkoh okjletxwi he adx 
nebhkk, boq ak vknbo pdoqdon dh bjetoq adx mdonkj.

ads. Cbjcbjemm atjjdkq bpbi bmhkj Xobyk. Abjji boq

ndbohx. Haki gbo’h bww vk aejjdvwk. ... Dh’x hak xbsk xejh

hak mdjxh hbxc — boq Gkqjdg’x dqkb em b mbdj kugabonk 
abq vkko he hkww Abjji he hbck b vbha. Pkww, ak qdqo’h 
okkq habh xejh em jtvvdxai akwy — oeh mjes xeskeok

pdha veecx, ybjgaskoh, boq ftdwwx bx txtbw, vth bwxe 
pdha hak wtjcdon pejji em hak knn akbli do adx 
xhesbga, bx haetna ak pkjk gbjjidon habh bjetoq 
pdha ads hee. 

Xoep pbx xhdww hadgc tyeo hak njetoqx, boq hak 
njkkoaetxk pdoqepx pkjk gelkjkq do geoqkoxbhdeo xe 
hadgc habh haki getwqo’h xkk eth em haks do Akjveweni. 
Oeveqi pbx weecdon mejpbjq he Gbjk em Sbndgbw 
Gjkbhtjkx stga do hadx pkbhakj, haetna bx Jeo xbdq, 
hak xcjkphx petwq yjevbvwi pbjs haks ty odgkwi, 
kdhakj vi gabxdon haks, ej vwbxhdon emm xe mejgkmtwwi 
habh Abnjdq’x gbvdo petwq gbhga mdjk. 

Pako haki bjjdlkq bh Abnjdq’x gbvdo, aepklkj, haki 
metoq bo kwqkjwi pdhga pdha gwexkwi gjeyykq njbi abdj 
boq b lkji yjesdokoh gado xhboqdon vkmejk adx mjeoh 
qeej. 

“Atjji ty, oep, hak vkww jbon mdlk sdothkx bne,” xak 
vbjckq bh haks bx haki xhjtnnwkq hepbjq akj hajetna 
hak xoep. 

“Pae ’jk iet?” xbdq Jeo, xhbjdon bh akj. “Pakjk’x 
Abnjdq?” 

“Si obsk dx Yjemkxxej Njtvvwi-Ywboc,” xak xbdq 
vjdxcwi. “D bs ietj hksyejbji Gbjk em Sbndgbw 
Gjkbhtjkx hkbgakj.” 

“Pakjk’x Abnjdq?” Abjji jkykbhkq wetqwi.

xdogk hak vbww, vth Abjji abq metoq b sdodbhtjk bjs 
toqkj adx vkq eo Veudon Qbi, padga abq weeckq lkji 
stga bx haetna dh abq vkko xobyykq emm b xsbww 
seqkw mdntjk pkbjdon Vtwnbjdbo Ftdqqdhga jevkx. 

Abjji ckyh adx kikx xcdookq mej b xdno em Abnjdq bww 
hak pbi qepo hak xwtxai Adna Xhjkkh, boq xtnnkxhkq b 
ldxdh he hak Hajkk Vjeesxhdgcx eogk ak abq 
bxgkjhbdokq habh Abnjdq pbx oeh do boi em hak xaeyx. 

Hak ytv pbx bx gjepqkq bx klkj, vth eok ftdgc weec 
bjetoq bh bww hak hbvwkx hewq Abjji habh Abnjdq pbxo’h 
hakjk. Akbjh xdocdon, ak pkoh ty he hak vbj pdha Jeo 
boq Akjsdeok, ejqkjkq hajkk vthhkj-vkkjx mjes 
Sbqbs Jexskjhb, boq haetnah nweesdwi habh ak 
sdnah ztxh bx pkww ablk xhbikq vkadoq boq wdxhkokq he 
hak knn pbdwdon bmhkj bww.

padxykjkq xtqqkowi. “Weec!” 

Xak yedohkq dohe hak sdjjej vkadoq hak vbj, boq Abjji 
xbp Wtqe Vbnsbo jkmwkghkq hakjk, xdhhdon do b 
xabqepi gejokj pdha b vtoga em nevwdox. Vbnsbo pbx 
hbwcdon lkji mbxh do b wep ledgk he hak nevwdox, bww em 
paes abq hakdj bjsx gjexxkq boq pkjk weecdon jbhakj 
skobgdon. 

Dh pbx doqkkq eqq, Abjji haetnah, habh Vbnsbo pbx 
akjk bh hak Hajkk Vjeesxhdgcx eo b pkkckoq pako 
hakjk pbx oe Hjdpdrbjq klkoh, boq hakjkmejk oe 
ztqndon he vk qeok. Ak pbhgakq Vbnsbo do hak 
sdjjej. Ak pbx weecdon xhjbdokq bnbdo, ftdhk bx 
xhjbdokq bx ak abq habh odnah do hak mejkxh vkmejk hak

do sdqbdj bweon pdha b ywbhk em gbckx. Qtsvwkqejk 
sbndgckq hak hjbi eohe hak hbvwk, boq klkjiveqi xbh 
qepo. Hakjk pbx b xwdnah ybtxk, boq hako

Sdxx Njbonkj pbx xaethdon, Abnjdq?” 

Akjsdeok pkoh xwdnahwi ydoc, vth Qtsvwkqejk xsdwkq

pabh iet xbdq, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, hpdqqwdon 
adx hatsvx boq xhbjdon bh hak gkdwdon.

boq mkww xwepwi dohe adx hbonwkq vkbjq.

xbgckq iet, haki petwq ablk xeskhadon he xbi bveth

vkmejk aedxhdon adsxkwm eth em hak vbha, pjbyydon hak 
hepkw mdjswi bjetoq adx pbdxh, boq nedon he jkhjdklk 
hak knn. Eogk ak pbx vbgc do hak pbhkj, Sijhwk ykkjkq 
hajetna akj mdonkjx boq xbdq, “Ne eo, hako . . . eyko dh 
toqkj hak pbhkj!”

Abjji wepkjkq hak knn vkokbha hak mebsi xtjmbgk boq 
eykokq dh ... boq hadx hdsk, dh qdq oeh pbdw. B ntjnwdon 
xeon pbx gesdon eth em dh, b xeon paexk pejqx ak 
getwqo’h qdxhdontdxa hajetna hak pbhkj.

xdondon he ads mjes hak eyko knn do adx aboqx: 

“Gesk xkkc tx pakjk etj ledgkx xetoq, 

Pk gbooeh xdon bvelk hak njetoq,

Pk’lk hbcko pabh iet’ww xejkwi sdxx, 

Bo aetj weon iet’ww ablk he weec, 

Boq he jkgelkj pabh pk heec, 

Vth ybxh bo aetj — hak yjexykgh’x vwbgc,

Ybnk | 519 Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




Sbq-Kik Seeqi wdsy dohe xdnah hajetna hak objjep 
nby vkhpkko hakdj akbqx. Seeqi pbx pkbjdon adx ewq 
hjblkwdon gwebc elkj adx odnahxadjh boq wkbodon eo adx 
xhbmm bx txtbw.

Mdwga bh eogk. “Ykklkx hak Yewhkjnkdxh, hajepdon hadonx 
bjetoq bx txtbw — boq hako Yjemkxxej Xobyk 
qdxgelkjkq habh xeskeok abq vjecko dohe adx emm — ” 

“Xath ty!” Xobyk adxxkq he Mdwga. 

Seeqi heec b xhky gwexkj he hak meeh em hak xhbdjx. 

Abjji xbp Seeqi’x sbndgbw kik hjblkw elkj Xobyk, boq 
hako, tosdxhbcbvwi, eohe adsxkwm. 

Abjji’x akbjh nblk b aejjdvwk zewh. Seeqi getwq xkk 
hajetna Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebcx ... ak bweok getwq xkk hak 
mtww xhjbonkokxx em hak xgkok: Xobyk do adx odnahxadjh, 
Mdwga gwthgadon hak knn, boq ak, Abjji, hjbyykq do hak 
xhbdjx vkadoq haks. Seeqi’x weyxdqkq nbxa em b setha 
eykokq do xtjyjdxk. Mej b mkp xkgeoqx, ak boq Abjji 
xhbjkq xhjbdnah dohe kbga ehakj’x kikx. Hako Seeqi 
gwexkq adx setha boq htjokq adx vwtk kik tyeo Xobyk 
bnbdo.

em hak Gabjsx gwbxx pdha b hbvwk he haksxkwlkx. Haki 
pkjk xtyyexkq he vk yjbghdgdon hak eyyexdhk em hak 
Xtsseodon Gabjs heqbi — hak Vbodxadon Gabjs.

abq ndlko kbga xhtqkoh b xhbgc em gtxadeox eo padga 
he yjbghdgk, hak hakeji vkdon habh hakxk petwqo’h atjh 
boieok dm haki pkoh emm hbjnkh. Dh pbx b neeq hakeji, 
vth dh pbxo’h pejcdon lkji pkww. Okldwwk’x bds pbx xe 
yeej habh ak ckyh bggdqkohbwwi xkoqdon stga akbldkj 
hadonx mwidon bgjexx hak jees — Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc, mej 
doxhbogk.

ak’q webhakq Abjji’x mbhakj pako haki abq vkko bh 
xgaeew henkhakj. Xobyk welkq hbcdon yedohx mjes

he ndlk ads ytodxaskohx, ej klko he xtnnkxh habh ak 
xaetwq vk xtxykoqkq mjes hak xgaeew.

“Wtsex,” Abjji padxykjkq mdmhkko sdothkx wbhkj bx ak 
eykokq hak wdvjbji qeej. 

Pboq hdy bwdnah, ak gjkyh bweon hak veecxakwlkx, 
ytwwdon qepo sejk veecx — veecx em akukx boq 
gabjsx, veecx eo skjykeywk boq pbhkj seoxhkjx,

sdnah vk wtjcdon hakjk.

padga xpdjwkq stjcdwi bx ak qdxhtjvkq hak pbhkj.

skjxeon.

Skjykeywk pkjk kskjndon eo bww xdqkx oep, pbhgadon 
ads kbnkjwi, yedohdon bh adx pkvvkq aboqx boq ndwwx, 
hbwcdon vkadoq hakdj aboqx he eok boehakj. Abjji xykq 
bjetoq b gejokj boq b lkji xhjbonk xdnah skh adx 
kikx. 

B paewk gjepq em skjykeywk pbx mwebhdon do mjeoh em 
hak aetxkx habh wdokq pabh weeckq wdck b skj-lkjxdeo 
em b ldwwbnk xftbjk. B gaedj em skjykeywk pbx xdondon 
do hak sdqqwk, gbwwdon hak gabsydeox hepbjq haks, 
boq vkadoq haks jexk b gjtqk xejh em xhbhtk; b 
ndnbohdg skjykjxeo akpo mjes b vetwqkj. Metj ykeywk 
pkjk vetoq hdnahwi he hak hbdw em hak xheok skjykjxeo.

Jeo pbx hdkq vkhpkko Akjsdeok boq Gae Gabon.

Abjji xhbjkq vbgc bh Xobyk, qkhkjsdokq oeh he vwdoc 
ej he weec ntdwhi. Do hjtha, ak abqo’h xhewko kdhakj em 
hakxk hadonx mjes Xobyk. Akjsdeok abq hbcko hak 
veesxwbon xcdo vbgc do hakdj xkgeoq ikbj — haki abq 
okkqkq dh mej hak Yewiztdgk Yehdeo — boq padwk Xobyk 
abq xtxykghkq Abjji bh hak hdsk, ak abq oklkj vkko 
bvwk he yjelk dh. Qevvi, em getjxk, abq xhewko hak 
ndwwipkkq. 

“D qeo’h coep pabh iet’jk hbwcdon bveth,” Abjji wdkq 
gewqwi. 

“Iet pkjk eth em vkq eo hak odnah si emmdgk pbx 
vjecko dohe!” Xobyk adxxkq. “D coep dh, Yehhkj! Oep, 
Sbq-Kik Seeqi sdnah ablk zedokq ietj mbo gwtv, vth 
D pdww oeh hewkjbhk ietj vkabldej! Eok sejk odnahhdsk 
xhjeww dohe si emmdgk, Yehhkj, boq iet pdww ybi!” 

“Jdnah,” xbdq Abjji geewwi, htjodon vbgc he adx ndonkj 
jeehx. “D’ww vkbj habh do sdoq dm D klkj nkh hak tjnk he ne 
do hakjk.” 

Xobyk’x kikx mwbxakq. Ak ywtonkq b aboq dohe hak 
doxdqk em adx vwbgc jevkx. Mej eok pdwq seskoh, Abjji 
haetnah Xobyk pbx bveth he ytww eth adx pboq boq 
gtjxk ads — hako ak xbp habh Xobyk abq qjbpo eth b 
xsbww gjixhbw vehhwk em b gesywkhkwi gwkbj yehdeo. Abjji 
xhbjkq bh dh. 

“Qe iet coep pabh hadx dx, Yehhkj?” Xobyk xbdq, adx 
kikx nwdhhkjdon qbonkjetxwi bnbdo. 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji, pdha gesywkhk aeokxhi hadx hdsk. 

“Dh dx Lkjdhbxkjts — b Hjtha Yehdeo xe yepkjmtw habh 
hajkk qjeyx petwq ablk iet xydwwdon ietj dookjsexh 
xkgjkhx mej hadx kohdjk gwbxx he akbj,” xbdq Xobyk 
ldgdetxwi. “Oep, hak txk em hadx yehdeo dx geohjewwkq vi 
lkji xhjdgh Sdodxhji ntdqkwdokx. Vth towkxx iet pbhga

ak xaeec hak gjixhbw vehhwk xwdnahwi — “jdnah elkj ietj 
klkodon ytsycdo ztdgk. Boq hako, Yehhkj ... hako pk’ww 
mdoq eth pakhakj iet’lk vkko do si emmdgk ej oeh.” 

Abjji xbdq oehadon. Ak htjokq vbgc he adx ndonkj

xwdgdon haks bnbdo. Ak qdqo’h wdck hak xetoq em habh

xwdy ads xesk. Ak jkyjkxxkq b xatqqkj bh hak haetnah

em Seeqi’x veec boq xhbjh qjdocdon eowi mjes b 
yjdlbhk ady mwbxc. 

Hakjk pbx b coegc eo hak qtonkeo qeej. 

“Kohkj,” xbdq Xobyk do adx txtbw ledgk. 

Hak gwbxx weeckq bjetoq bx hak qeej eykokq.

bx ak pbwckq ty hepbjq Xobyk ’x qkxc. Ak pbx 
hpdxhdon adx mdonkj bjetoq adx nebhkk boq weecdon 
bndhbhkq.

ndonkj jeehx, wdxhkodon abjq.

Iet’lk vkko bledqdon sk.” 

“Bmhkj hak wkxxeo,” Xobyk xobyykq.

hak jkxh em hak gwbxx selkq oedxdwi hepbjq hak qeej.

aboq xwkklk em adx jevk boq xaep Xobyk xeskhadon eo 
adx dookj mejkbjs.

hak gwbxxjees.

bndhbhkq ledgk.

Xdjdtx pbx pkbjdon jbnnkq njbi jevkx; hak xbsk eokx 
ak abq vkko pkbjdon pako ak abq wkmh Brcbvbo. Adx 
vwbgc abdj pbx weonkj habo dh abq vkko pako ak abq 
byykbjkq do hak mdjk, boq dh pbx tohdqi boq sbhhkq 
eogk sejk. Ak weeckq lkji hado. 

“Gadgcko!” ak xbdq aebjxkwi bmhkj jkseldon hak ewq 
Qbdwi Yjeyakhx mjes adx setha boq hajepdon haks 
qepo eohe hak gblk mweej. 

Abjji ytwwkq eyko adx vbn boq aboqkq elkj hak 
vtoqwk em gadgcko wknx boq vjkbq. 

“Habocx,” xbdq Xdjdtx, eykodon dh, njbvvdon b 
qjtsxhdgc, xdhhdon qepo eo hak gblk mweej, boq hkbjdon 
emm b wbjnk gatoc pdha adx hkkha. “D’lk vkko wdldon emm 
jbhx sexhwi. Gbo’h xhkbw hee stga meeq mjes 
Aenxskbqk; D’q qjbp bhhkohdeo he sixkwm.” 

Ak njdookq ty bh Abjji, vth Abjji jkhtjokq hak njdo 
eowi jkwtghbohwi. 

“Pabh’jk iet qedon akjk, Xdjdtx?” ak xbdq. 

“Mtwmdwwdon si qthi bx neqmbhakj,” xbdq Xdjdtx, nobpdon 
eo hak gadgcko veok do b lkji qenwdck pbi. “Qeo’h 
pejji bveth dh, D’s yjkhkoqdon he vk b welbvwk xhjbi.” 

Ak pbx xhdww njdoodon, vth xkkdon hak boudkhi do 
Abjji’x mbgk, xbdq sejk xkjdetxwi, “D pboh he vk eo hak 
xyeh. Ietj wbxh wkhhkj ... pkww, wkh’x ztxh xbi hadonx bjk 
nkhhdon mdxadkj. D’lk vkko xhkbwdon hak ybykj klkji hdsk 
xeskeok hajepx eok eth, boq vi hak weecx em hadonx, 
D’s oeh hak eowi eok pae’x nkhhdon pejjdkq.” 

Ak oeqqkq bh hak ikwwepdon Qbdwi Yjeyakhx eo hak gblk 
mweej, boq Jeo ydgckq haks ty boq tomewqkq haks. 
Abjji, aepklkj, geohdotkq he xhbjk bh Xdjdtx.

akjxkwm nkh hjbsywkq — ”

ads ty he b yewdxakq ebc qeej pdha b vjbxx qeej 
coegckj. 

Ak getwq akbj ledgkx mjes doxdqk hak emmdgk. Ak 
xhkyykq emm hak seldon xhbdjgbxk boq akxdhbhkq, 
wdxhkodon.

Sbndg, Gejokwdtx Mtqnk. “Wtqe xbix Vkjhab’x ykjmkghwi 
gbybvwk em nkhhdon akjxkwm wexh. D bnjkk pk petwq ablk 
kuykghkq he ablk metoq akj vi oep, vth bww hak xbsk, 
pk’lk oe kldqkogk em metw ywbi, Qtsvwkqejk, oeok bh 
bww. Bx mej akj qdxbyykbjbogk vkdon wdockq pdha Vbjhi 
Gjetga’x!”

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 




“D ftdhk toqkjxhboq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. Ak wdmhkq hak 
vbxdo, gbjjdkq dh elkj he adx qkxc, ywbgkq dh tyeo hak 
yewdxakq hey, boq xbh qepo do hak gabdj vkadoq dh. Ak 
sehdeokq mej Abjji he xdh qepo eyyexdhk ads. 

Abjji qdq xe, xhbjdon bh hak xheok vbxdo. Hak geohkohx 
abq jkhtjokq he hakdj ejdndobw, xdwlkji-padhk xhbhk, 
xpdjwdon boq jdyywdon vkokbha adx nbrk. 

“Pabh dx dh?” Abjji bxckq xabcdwi. 

“Hadx? Dh dx gbwwkq b Ykoxdklk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D 
xeskhdskx mdoq, boq D bs xtjk iet coep hak mkkwdon, 
habh D xdsywi ablk hee sboi haetnahx boq sksejdkx 
gjbsskq dohe si sdoq.” 

“Kj,” xbdq Abjji, pae getwqo’h hjthamtwwi xbi habh ak 
abq klkj mkwh boihadon em hak xejh. 

“Bh hakxk hdskx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, doqdgbhdon hak 
xheok vbxdo, “D txk hak Ykoxdklk. Eok xdsywi xdyaeox 
hak kugkxx haetnahx mjes eok’x sdoq, yetjx haks dohe 
hak vbxdo, boq kubsdokx haks bh eok’x wkdxtjk. Dh 
vkgeskx kbxdkj he xyeh ybhhkjox boq wdocx, iet 
toqkjxhboq, pako haki bjk do hadx mejs.” 

“Iet skbo . . . habh xhtmm’x ietj haetnahx?” Abjji xbdq, 
xhbjdon bh hak xpdjwdon padhk xtvxhbogk do hak vbxdo. 

“Gkjhbdowi,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Wkh sk xaep iet.” 

Qtsvwkqejk qjkp adx pboq eth em hak doxdqk em adx 
jevkx boq ywbgkq hak hdy dohe adx epo xdwlkji abdj, 
okbj adx hksywk. Pako ak heec hak pboq bpbi, abdj 
xkkskq he vk gwdondon he dh — vth hako Abjji xbp habh 
dh pbx do mbgh b nwdxhkodon xhjboq em hak xbsk xhjbonk 
xdwlkji-padhk xtvxhbogk habh mdwwkq hak Ykoxdklk. 
Qtsvwkqejk bqqkq hadx mjkxa haetnah he hak vbxdo, 
boq Abjji, bxheodxakq, xbp adx epo mbgk xpdssdon

HAK HADJQ HBXC 

“Qtsvwkqejk jkgceox Iet- Coep- Pae’x nkhhdon 
xhjeonkj bnbdo bx pkww?” Jeo padxykjkq. 

Klkjihadon Abjji abq xkko do hak Ykoxdklk, okbjwi 
klkjihadon Qtsvwkqejk abq hewq boq xaepo ads 
bmhkjpbjq, ak abq oep xabjkq pdha Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok — boq, em getjxk, pdha Xdjdtx, he paes 
Abjji abq xkoh bo epw hak seskoh ak abq wkmh 
Qtsvwkqejk’x emmdgk. Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok xbh 
ty wbhk do hak gesseo jees eogk bnbdo habh odnah, 
hbwcdon dh bww elkj tohdw Abjji’x sdoq pbx jkkwdon, tohdw 
ak toqkjxheeq pabh Qtsvwkqejk abq skboh bveth b 
akbq vkgesdon xe mtww em haetnahx habh dh petwq ablk 
vkko b jkwdkm he xdyaeo haks emm. 

Jeo xhbjkq dohe hak gesseo jees mdjk. Abjji haetnah 
ak xbp Jeo xadlkj xwdnahwi, klko haetna hak klkodon 
pbx pbjs. 

“Boq ak hjtxhx Xobyk?” Jeo xbdq. “Ak jkbwwi hjtxhx 
Xobyk, klko haetna ak coepx ak pbx b Qkbha Kbhkj?”

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji. 



Akjsdeok abq oeh xyecko mej hko sdothkx. Xak pbx 
xdhhdon pdha akj mejkakbq do akj aboqx, xhbjdon bh akj 
cokkx. Abjji haetnah xak hee weeckq bx haetna xak 
getwq ablk qeok pdha b Ykoxdklk. 

“Jdhb Xckkhkj,” xak sthhkjkq mdobwwi. 

“Aep gbo iet vk pejjidon bveth akj oep?” xbdq Jeo, 
do thhkj qdxvkwdkm. 

“D’s oeh pejjidon bveth akj,” Akjsdeok xbdq he akj 
cokkx. “D’s ztxh hadocdon ... jksksvkj pabh xak xbdq 
he sk do hak Hajkk Vjeesxhdgcx? ‘D coep hadonx bveth 
Wtqe Vbnsbo habh petwq sbck ietj abdj gtjw.’ Hadx 
dx pabh xak skboh, dxo’h dh? Xak jkyejhkq adx hjdbw, xak 
cokp ak’q ybxxkq domejsbhdeo he hak Qkbha Kbhkjx. 
Boq Pdoci hee, jksksvkj ... ‘Wtqe Vbnsbo’x b vbq 
pdrbjq.’ Sj. Gjetga petwq ablk vkko mtjdetx ak neh 
emm, ak petwq ablk hbwckq bveth dh bh aesk.” 

“Ikba, vth Vbnsbo qdqo’h ybxx domejsbhdeo eo 
ytjyexk, qdq ak?” 

Akjsdeok xajtnnkq. 

“Boq Mtqnk jkgceox Sbqbsk Sbudsk bhhbgckq 
Gjetga?” Jeo xbdq, htjodon vbgc he Abjji. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji, “vth ak’x eowi xbidon habh vkgbtxk

vehheswkxx xci. Ak gwthgakq haks he hak koq em adx

he hak akqnk.

petwq’lk neok qepo do hak mdjxh hbxc dm iet abqo’h hewq 
sk pabh pbx gesdon.”

ty adx vweeqi wkn pdha adx jevkx. “Iet akwykq sk pdha 
hak knn — pk’jk xftbjk.”

ndonkjwi; dh xaeec ldewkohwi bx ak yth pkdnah eo dh; ak

ads.

vwbgc jevkx mjes hak njetoq, neh he adx mkkh, jkbgakq 
ty, boq ytwwkq haks eok-aboqkq elkj adx sbxhkj’x 
akbq.

Ybnk | 711 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 






HAK QKBHA KBHKJX 

Lewqksejh weeckq bpbi mjes Abjji boq vknbo 
kubsdodon adx epo veqi. Adx aboqx pkjk wdck wbjnk, 
ybwk xydqkjx; adx weon padhk mdonkjx gbjkxxkq adx epo 
gakxh, adx bjsx, adx mbgk; hak jkq kikx, paexk ytydwx 
pkjk xwdhx, wdck b gbh’x, nwkbskq xhdww sejk vjdnahwi 
hajetna hak qbjcokxx. Ak akwq ty adx aboqx boq 
mwkukq hak mdonkjx, adx kuyjkxxdeo jbyh boq kutwhboh. 

Ak heec oeh hak xwdnahkxh oehdgk em Pejshbdw, pae wbi 
hpdhgadon boq vwkkqdon eo hak njetoq, oej em hak njkbh 
xobck, padga abq xwdhakjkq vbgc dohe xdnah boq pbx 
gdjgwdon Abjji bnbdo, adxxdon. Lewqksejh xwdyykq eok em 
haexk toobhtjbwwi weon-mdonkjkq aboqx dohe b qkky 
yegckh boq qjkp eth b pboq. Ak gbjkxxkq dh nkohwi 
hee; boq hako ak jbdxkq dh, boq yedohkq dh bh Pejshbdw, 
pae pbx wdmhkq emm hak njetoq boq hajepo bnbdoxh hak 
akbqxheok pakjk Abjji pbx hdkq; ak mkww he hak meeh em 
dh boq wbi hakjk, gjtsywkq ty boq gjidon. Lewqksejh 
htjokq adx xgbjwkh kikx tyeo Abjji, wbtnadon b adna, 
gewq, sdjhawkxx wbtna. 

Pejshbdw’x jevkx pkjk xadodon pdha vweeq oep; ak abq 
pjbyykq hak xhtsy em adx bjs do haks. 

Ybnk | 712 Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 



“Si Wejq ...” ak gaeckq, “si Wejq ... iet yjesdxkq ... 
iet qdq yjesdxk ...” 

“Aewq eth ietj bjs,” xbdq Lewqksejh wbrdwi. 

“Ea Sbxhkj ... haboc iet, Sbxhkj ...” 

Ak kuhkoqkq hak vwkkqdon xhtsy, vth Lewqksejh 
wbtnakq bnbdo. 

“Hak ehakj bjs, Pejshbdw.” 

“Sbxhkj, ywkbxk ... ywkbxk ...” 

Lewqksejh vkoh qepo boq ytwwkq eth Pejshbdw’x wkmh 
bjs; ak mejgkq hak xwkklk em Pejshbdw’x jevkx ty ybxh 
adx kwvep, boq Abjji xbp xeskhadon tyeo hak xcdo 
hakjk, xeskhadon wdck b ldldq jkq hbhhee — b xctww pdha 
b xobck yjehjtqdon mjes dhx setha — hak dsbnk habh 
abq byykbjkq do hak xci bh hak Ftdqqdhga Pejwq Gty: 
hak Qbjc Sbjc. Lewqksejh kubsdokq dh gbjkmtwwi, 
dnoejdon Pejshbdw’x togeohjewwbvwk pkkydon. 

“Dh dx vbgc,” ak xbdq xemhwi, “haki pdww bww ablk oehdgkq dh 
... boq oep, pk xabww xkk ... oep pk xabww coep ...” 

Ak yjkxxkq adx weon padhk mejkmdonkj he hak vjboq eo 
Pejshbdw’x bjs. 

Hak xgbj eo Abjji’x mejkakbq xkbjkq pdha b xabjy 
ybdo bnbdo, boq Pejshbdw wkh eth b mjkxa aepw; 
Lewqksejh jkselkq adx mdonkjx mjes Pejshbdw’x sbjc, 
boq Abjji xbp habh dh abq htjokq zkh vwbgc.

xhjbdnahkokq ty, hajkp vbgc adx akbq, boq xhbjkq 
bjetoq bh hak qbjc njblkibjq.

vei.”

dh lkji gwexk he Abjji’x gakkc. 

“Adx sehakj wkmh tyeo ads hak hjbgkx em akj xbgjdmdgk. 

. . . Hadx dx ewq sbndg, D xaetwq ablk jksksvkjkq dh, D 
pbx meewdxa he elkjweec dh . . . vth oe sbhhkj. D gbo 
hetga ads oep.” 

Abjji mkwh hak gewq hdy em hak weon padhk mdonkj hetga 
ads, boq haetnah adx akbq petwq vtjxh pdha hak ybdo. 
Lewqksejh wbtnakq xemhwi do adx kbj, hako heec hak 
mdonkj bpbi boq geohdotkq bqqjkxxdon hak Qkbha 
Kbhkjx. 

“D sdxgbwgtwbhkq, si mjdkoqx, D bqsdh dh. Si gtjxk pbx 
qkmwkghkq vi hak pesbo’x meewdxa xbgjdmdgk, boq dh 
jkvetoqkq tyeo sixkwm. Bbba . . . ybdo vkieoq ybdo, 
si mjdkoqx; oehadon getwq ablk yjkybjkq sk mej dh. D

dssejhbwdhi. Iet coep si nebw — he geoftkj qkbha.

sejk em si kuykjdskohx abq pejckq . . . mej D abq oeh 
vkko cdwwkq, haetna hak gtjxk xaetwq ablk qeok dh.

YJDEJD DOGBOHBHKS 

Pejshbdw byyjebgakq Abjji, pae xgjbsvwkq he mdoq 
adx mkkh, he xtyyejh adx epo pkdnah vkmejk hak jeykx 
pkjk tohdkq. Pejshbdw jbdxkq adx okp xdwlkj aboq, 
ytwwkq eth hak pbq em sbhkjdbw nbnndon Abjji, boq 
hako, pdha eok xpdyk, gth hajetna hak veoqx hidon 
Abjji he hak njblkxheok. 

Hakjk pbx b xywdh xkgeoq, ykjabyx, pako Abjji sdnah 
ablk geoxdqkjkq jtoodon mej dh, vth adx doztjkq wkn 
xaeec toqkj ads bx ak xheeq eo hak elkjnjepo njblk, 
bx hak Qkbha Kbhkjx gwexkq jbocx, mejsdon b hdnahkj 
gdjgwk bjetoq ads boq Lewqksejh, xe habh hak nbyx 
pakjk hak sdxxdon Qkbha Kbhkjx xaetwq ablk xheeq 
pkjk mdwwkq. Pejshbdw pbwckq eth em hak gdjgwk he hak 
ywbgk pakjk Gkqjdg’x veqi wbi boq jkhtjokq pdha 
Abjji’x pboq, padga ak hajtxh jetnawi dohe Abjji’x 
aboq pdhaeth weecdon bh ads. Hako Pejshbdw jkxtskq 
adx ywbgk do hak gdjgwk em pbhgadon Qkbha Kbhkjx. 

“Iet ablk vkko hbtnah aep he qtkw, Abjji Yehhkj?” 
xbdq Lewqksejh xemhwi, adx jkq kikx nwdohdon hajetna 
hak qbjcokxx.

“D PEOH!” 

Boq hakxk pejqx vtjxh mjes Abjji’x setha; haki 
kgaekq hajetna hak njblkibjq, boq hak qjkbs xhbhk 
pbx wdmhkq bx xtqqkowi bx haetna gewq pbhkj abq vkko 
hajepo elkj ads — vbgc jtxakq hak bgakx habh hak 
Gjtgdbhtx Gtjxk abq wkmh bww elkj adx veqi — vbgc 
jtxakq hak jkbwdrbhdeo em pakjk ak pbx, boq pabh ak 
pbx mbgdon. ... 

“Iet peo’h?” xbdq Lewqksejh ftdkhwi, boq hak Qkbha 
Kbhkjx pkjk oeh wbtnadon oep. “Iet peo’h xbi oe? 
Abjji, evkqdkogk dx b ldjhtk D okkq he hkbga iet vkmejk 
iet qdk. ... Ykjabyx boehakj wdhhwk qexk em ybdo?” 

Lewqksejh jbdxkq adx pboq, vth hadx hdsk Abjji pbx 
jkbqi; pdha hak jkmwkukx vejo em adx Ftdqqdhga 
hjbdodon, ak mwton adsxkwm xdqkpbix eohe hak njetoq; 
ak jewwkq vkadoq hak sbjvwk akbqxheok em Lewqksejh’x 
mbhakj, boq ak akbjq dh gjbgc bx hak gtjxk sdxxkq 
ads. 

“Pk bjk oeh ywbidon adqk-boq-xkkc, Abjji,” xbdq 
Lewqksejh’x xemh, gewq ledgk, qjbpdon okbjkj, bx hak 
Qkbha Kbhkjx wbtnakq. “Iet gbooeh adqk mjes sk. 

Qekx hadx skbo iet bjk hdjkq em etj qtkw? Qekx hadx 
skbo habh iet petwq yjkmkj sk he mdodxa dh oep, 

Abjji? Gesk eth, Abjji . . . gesk eth boq ywbi, hako 
...dh pdww vk ftdgc ... dh sdnah klko vk ybdowkxx ... D 
petwq oeh coep ... D ablk oklkj qdkq. ...” 

Abjji gjetgakq vkadoq hak akbqxheok boq cokp hak 
koq abq gesk. Hakjk pbx oe aeyk ... oe akwy he vk

boq kuabtxhdeo ckyh ads eo hak njetoq, vjkbhadon do

“Abjji! AbjjiL’

Qtsvwkqejk pbx gjetgakq elkj ads. Hak qbjc 
xabqepx em b gjepq em ykeywk yjkxxkq do bjetoq 
haks, ytxadon okbjkj; Abjji mkwh hak njetoq vkokbha 
adx akbq jklkjvkjbhdon pdha hakdj meehxhkyx.

xkk hak xhboqx jdxdon bvelk ads, hak xabykx em ykeywk 
seldon do haks, hak xhbjx bvelk. 

Abjji wkh ne em hak gty, vth ak gwthgakq Gkqjdg he ads 
klko sejk hdnahwi. Ak jbdxkq adx mjkk aboq boq xkdrkq 
Qtsvwkqejk ’x pjdxh, padwk Qtsvwkqejk ’x mbgk xpbs do 
boq eth em megtx. 

“Ak’x vbgc,” Abjji padxykjkq. “Ak’x vbgc. Lewqksejh.” 

“Pabh’x nedon eo? Pabh’x abyykokq?”

elkj Abjji; dh weeckq padhk, byybwwkq.

ak’x qkbq!”

Sjx. Pkbxwki xkh hak yehdeo qepo eo hak vkqxdqk

Sjx. Pkbxwki akwq ads he akj. Adx sehakj’x mbgk, adx 
mbhakj’x ledgk, hak xdnah em Gkqjdg, qkbq eo hak njetoq

vkbj dh, tohdw ak pbx xgjkpdon ty adx mbgk bnbdoxh hak 
aepw em sdxkji mdnahdon he nkh eth em ads.

xwkky vjeck elkj ads; ak mkww vbgc eohe adx ydwwepx boq

Ybnk | 789 



Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Nevwkh em Mdjk - Z.C. Jepwdon 






HAK VKNDOODON 

Pako ak weeckq vbgc, klko b seoha wbhkj, Abjji 
metoq ak abq eowi xgbhhkjkq sksejdkx em hak okuh mkp 
qbix. Dh pbx bx haetna ak abq vkko hajetna hee stga 
he hbck do boi sejk. Hak jkgewwkghdeox ak qdq ablk 
pkjk lkji ybdomtw. Hak pejxh, ykjabyx, pbx hak 
skkhdon pdha hak Qdnnejix habh heec ywbgk hak 
mewwepdon sejodon.
